title: 安信证券上饶凤凰大道营业部总经理
company_name: 安信证券股份有限公司
company_universal_name: 安信证券股份有限公司
description: 该职位来源于猎聘 职责描述: 1、负责营业部的经营与发展； 2、负责市场开拓、客户开发及维护、营销推广，市场销售渠道的建立和管理； 3、负责营业部的团队建设工作，组织员工的聘用、管理和考核； 4、负责营业部所在地域外部关系的维护； 任职要求: 1、大学本科及以上学历，从事证券工作5年或金融工作8年以上； 2、熟悉金融、证券业务知识，熟悉相关法律法规，具有较高的政策水平和专业素养，了解行业发展； 3、具有较强的学习能力、统筹规划和组织协调能力，具有创新意识。

title: Registered Nurse - Open Interviews
description:
1185 Monroe, Dearborn, Michigan, 48124, United States of America

Hello Future Teammates! Looking to join a great place to work? DaVita is hosting an Open Interview day for Registered Nurses!

Retention Bonuses Offered!!!

No previous dialysis experience required - Paid Training provided!

DaVita Clinics Locations Hiring:
  • Dearborn - 1185 Monroe, Dearborn, MI
  • East Dearborn - 13200 West Warren, Suite A, Dearborn, MI
  • Oakwood - 18100 Oakwood Blvd., Suite 206, Dearborn, MI
  • Redford - 22711 Grand River, Detroit, MI
  • Schaefer - 18100 Schaefer Highway, Detroit, MI
Event Information: RSVP Here
  • Date: Thursday, August 4th 2022
  • Time: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm EST
  • Location: Cornerstone Dialysis clinic - 23857 Greenfield Rd, Southfield, MI 480758 (Map It!)
What To Expect
  • Meet and interview with our local leadership team
  • Quick clinic tour to see what to expect (Check out our virtual tour before you go - Outpatient Facility)
  • Time to ask questions and learn more about the team (Interview Tips)
    • How To Prepare
    • Bring your resume!
    • Scrubs or office casual (no suit or tie needed) and grab your friends, too!
    • Masks will be required while in the facility
    What does the RN role entail?
    • Outpatient Day roles: Rotating Schedule of 3- 4 day work weeks, including rotating Saturday’s with Sunday off, Starting and ending times can range from 4:00 am to 8:00 pm with average hours ranging from 12 to 14 hours a day.
    • Outpatient Nocturnal roles: Rotating schedule of Tuesday/Thursday/Sunday, starting and ending ranging from 3:30 pm to 2:00 am with hours ranging from 10 to 12 hours a day.
    • Oversee a group of up to 16 dialysis patients with the partnership of up to 4 fully trained PCTs
    • Paid Dialysis Training provided
    What does a successful RN look like?
    • At least 1 year of hands on nursing experience
    • Experience within fast paced settings such as ER, CCU, ICU, MedSurg and Dialysis (Hemo, PD, HHD, CRRT) ideal
    • ADN / BSN / Diploma in Nursing with an active current RN license in Michigan
    • Confident in working independently as floor lead for patients and team of PCTs
    • Flexibility and availability to work mornings, evenings, weekends and holidays as needed
    • Someone who is eager to learn and expand their nursing experience
    Due to national CMS & OSHA regulation, all DaVita Teammates must be vaccinated or approved for a religious or medical exemption.

    Get to Know Us!
    • DaVita Mission and Values
    • DaVita Facts
    • DaVita Rewards & Benefits
    • Registered Nurse - ICHD, HHD, PD
    Are you ready to make a positive difference in a patient’s life? Take the first step at careers.davita.com.

    DaVita is an equal opportunity employer – Vet and Disability. To learn more about what this means click here.
    • PLEASE NOTE***
    In-Center Registered Nurses bonus payout schedule: $5,000 at 6 months, $2,500 at 12 months, and $2,500 at 18 months
    • Current DaVita Teammates excluded from any sign on or retention bonuses
    At DaVita, we strive to be a community first and a company second. We want all teammates to experience DaVita as "a place where I belong." Our goal is to embed Diversity & Belonging into everything we do in our Village, so that it becomes part of who we are. We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer. As such, individuals are recruited, hired, assigned and promoted without regard to race, national origin, religion, age, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, protected veteran status, or any other protected characteristic.

    Salary/ Wage Range

    Compensation for the role will depend on a number of factors, including a candidate’s qualifications, skills, competencies and experience and may fall outside of the range shown. DaVita offers a competitive total rewards package, which includes a 401k match, healthcare coverage and a broad range of other benefits. Learn more at https://careers.davita.com/benefits

title: HSE Officer
description:
Requirements

Calificari si experienta necesara:
  • Studii superioare, de preferat in domeniul tehnic;
  • Minimum 3 ani experienta intr-o pozitie similara intr-o companie de productie;
  • Bune abilitati de comunicare si lucru in echipa;
  • Bune aptitudini de planificare si organizare;
  • Cunostinte avansate de operare calculator: Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint;
  • Limba engleza - nivel mediu;
Rolul Principal

Responsibilities

Organizarea, implementarea si monitorizarea activitatilor de prevenire si stingere a incendiilor si a serviciului privat pentru situatii de urgenta.

Responsabilitati
  • Realizeaza instruirea introductiv generala (PSI) pentru noii angajati si asigura testarea cunostintelor dobandite in urma instruirii;
  • Realizeaza instruirea la locul de munca pentru personalul administrativ;
  • Intocmeste si comunica tematica de instruire la locul de munca si periodica pentru toate departamentele;
  • Participa la instruirile periodice, se asigura de efectuarea lor si valideaza fisele PSI;
  • Participa la evaluarea factorilor de risc de accidentare si imbolnavire profesionala;
  • Efectueaza audituri HSE in toate departamentele si informeza persoanele relevante;
  • Mentine actualizate actele de autoritate conform prevederilor legale in vigoare;
  • Intocmeste si actualizeaza instructiuni proprii pentru: prevenirea incendiilor, substante si amestecuri periculoase;
  • Intocmeste si mentine la zi evidenta dispozitivelor de detectie, alarmare si stingere;
  • Este responsabil cu verificarea lunara a mijloacelor de stingere;
  • Participa la reviziile periodice ale dispozitivelor de detectie si alarmare organizate impreuna cu prestatorii de servicii autorizati;
  • Intocmeste si actualizeaza documentele de organizare si functionare a activitatii serviciului privat pentru situatii de urgenta;
  • Responsabil pentru planificarea activitatii de pregatire a personalului serviciului privat pentru situatii de urgenta;
  • Asigura respectarea prevederilor actelor normative specifice in vigoare;
  • Organizeaza activitatea de prevenire;
  • Asigura patrimoniul serviciului privat, modul de exploatare, intretinerea, evidenta si controlul materialelor din dotare;
  • Conduce actiunile de interventie in limita competentelor stabilite;
  • Intocmeste rapoartele de interventie;
  • Efectueaza evaluarea si instruirea furnizorilor externi care executa lucrari de prestari servicii pe teritoriul companiei;
  • Participa la sedintele de CSSM, PSI, Protectia mediului;
  • Participa la gestionarea bugetului pe parte de HSE;

title: Arbetsledare
description:
Sökes till Rönninge

Peab Anläggning i Rönninge har lång erfarenhet och bred kompetens inom mark & anläggning. Vårt bevakningsområde är på södra sidan av Stockholm och vi fortsätter att expandera med en intressant projektportfölj. Nu söker vi en erfaren arbetsledare som vill vara med och bereda vägen framåt i en välfungerande och driven grupp.

Om rollen

Som arbetsledare kommer du att bistå platschefen, planera leda och fördela arbetet gentemot våra hantverkare inom anläggning. Du ansvarar för olika projekt, vilket bland annat innefattar kvalitetssäkring, kundkontakt, ekonomiprognoser, planering av personal och maskiner, fakturering samt delaktighet vid budget. På Peab är vi stolta över den individanpassade utveckling som vi kan erbjuda våra medarbetare och du har goda möjligheter att göra karriär hos oss.

Vem är du

Vi söker dig som har bygg/anläggningsteknisk utbildning och/eller relevant arbetslivserfarenhet som vi bedömer likvärdig. Som person är du driven, initiativtagande och motiverad. Vidare ser vi att du har goda ledaregenskaper och kan arbeta självständigt, samt att du har förmåga att skapa förtroende för såväl medarbetare, kund och allmänhet. Du behärskar svenska i tal och skrift och B-körkort är ett krav. Tjänsten är på heltid med tillträde enligt överenskommelse.

På Peab är vi stolta över den individanpassade utveckling som vi kan erbjuda våra medarbetare och du har goda möjligheter att göra karriär hos oss. Urval för denna rekrytering kommer pga semester påbörjas först i slutet av augusti. Tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.Har du några frågor? Kontakta Dante Crespo – arbetschef dante.crespo@peab.se eller Tobias Munoz, HR Partner, tobias.munoz@peab.se. Vänligen observera att vi inte tar emot ansökningar via mail.

Vi erbjuder

I Peabkoncernen blir du delaktig i det spännande arbetet att bygga framtidens hållbara samhälle. Vi engagerar oss i sociala frågor och i frågor som rör miljön för de människor som nu och i framtiden påverkas av det vi bygger och anlägger. Vi vill tillvarata all kompetens på arbetsmarknaden och eftersträvar mångfald.

Det är viktigt för oss att du delar våra kärnvärden jordnära, utvecklande, personliga och pålitliga eftersom de är grundläggande för det vi gör. Hos oss finns stora möjligheter till personlig utveckling. Vill du bygga ett hållbart samhälle med oss?

Välkommen med din ansökan!

Sök tjänsten

title: Field Medical Training Specialist
description:
FIELD MEDICAL TRAINING SPECIALIST
(REMOTE)


Required Skills:
  • Minimum of bachelor's degree in Business or Life Science is required, a master's degree is preferred but not required.
  • Proven track record of working in a matrix environment, strong teamwork skills, timely decision making and results orientation in meeting project objectives.
  • Demonstrated ability to manage, prioritize, and complete projects across multiple functions, training experience a plus.
  • Creative, innovative thinker with explicit understanding of digital platforms and application including, Power Point, Excel, Word, Microsoft Project etc.
  • Strong tactical familiarity with Medical Affairs, specifically related to Field Medical Roles.
  • Understanding of the legal and regulatory environment of the pharmaceutical industry, specifically related to Field Medical Excellence.
  • Medical Affairs experience.
  • Global experience.
  • MSL Field experience
Project Description:
Supporting the Director of Field Medical Excellence in advancing Client Aesthetics' Field Medical excellence.
  • In partnership with the Dir. of Field Medical Excellence, development of a field medical training curriculum focused on elevating non-science competencies and soft skills of the Field Medical Team.
  • Support with the development/Implementation of an MSL 101 onboarding Playbook.
  • Support with customization of Client Learning Development training models/platforms to meet training needs.
  • Ongoing support with project management and collaboration with external partners.
  • Ongoing support with updates to training platforms including the Passport portal.
  • Management of a Field Medical Repository.
  • Where appropriate, support of Global Scientific Communications and Training.
This 5+ month position starts ASAP.

Please E-MAIL your resume (attachment to email) with rate and availability to Cindi: cindi@alphaconsulting.com

ALPHA'S REQUIREMENT #22-02162
MUST BE ELIGIBLE TO WORK IN THE U.S. AS AN HOURLY W2 EMPLOYEE

title: 育児支援ありの登録販売者求人
company_name: クスリのアオキイータウンとなみ店
description:
富山県砺波市で登録販売者を募集中！ 【砺波市三島町】ナショナル社員募集！毎年働き方の変更可能です♪福利厚生・教育研修が充実◎数年先の自分をイメージしながら働ける職場です 募集職種: 登録販売者 仕事内容: 店長の補佐として担当売場を管理（接客や商品の発注、陳列、売上管理やスタッフの指導等） ※ナショナル社員として勤務（条件：全国転勤可能/特徴：当社の幹部候補生となるためキャリアアップに有利） 資格: 登録販売者 普通自動車免許（AT限定可） ※全国転勤可能な方/特徴：当社の幹部候補生となるためキャリアアップに有利 勤務時間: 9:00～22:00（休憩60分） 上記のうち、1ヶ月単位の変形労働時間制（週平均40時間以内） ※営業時間は店舗により異なる ※23:00、24:00まで営業の店舗もあり 休日・休暇: 基本週休2日 シフト制 年間休日108日以上 福利厚生: 社会保険完備 従業員持株会 社員割引購入制度 処方箋補助制度 確定拠出年金制度 定年再雇用（継続雇用制度） 社宅制度 短時間勤務制度（3歳に満たない子と同居し、養育している方が対象） 教育研修 ・新入社員研修 ・2年目社員研修 ・店長・薬局長研修 ・スーパーバイザー研修 ・新採用社員ガイダンス ・イオン・ハピコム総合研修（調剤・一般医薬品） ・ビューティーセミナー ・登録販売者研修 ・中堅育成セミナー ・海外研修 キャリアアップあり ・入社3～5年で店長に昇格。店長は店舗運営のすべてを任されます ・その後、適性に応じて店舗運営部、商品部、経営企画、開発などの本部社員へキャリアアップ可能 人事制度 ・総合職区分：ナショナル社員、リージョナル社員、ローカル社員 ・総合職区分は年1回申請により変更可 アピールポイント: #株式会社クスリのアオキをご紹介します 全国各地に調剤薬局併設のドラッグストアおよび調剤専門薬局を800以上展開。今後も店舗拡大を予定している成長企業です。（2020年春には岩手県、宮城県に出店。2020年内に山形県にも進出） #当社の原動力は4つ （1）戦略力 -専門性：調剤薬局併設の店舗展開を進めており、地域の方々のかかりつけ薬局を目指しています。 -利便性：医薬品や雑貨だけでなく食料品を充実させ、クスリのアオキだけで買い物がすべて完結する店舗づくりに取り組んでいます。 -ドミナント：専門性と利便性が高い店舗を特定の地域に集中出店することにより、お客様からの認知度を高めています。 （2）拡大力 当社はIT・物流インフラを整備し、店舗数の急増に対応できる環境を整えました。その結果、2014年～2019年の5年間に店舗数は2倍以上に拡大しています。 （3）組織力 従業員は約15,000人。従業員同士の連携やチーム同士の結束、更には店舗運営/商品/開発/管理の4本部が連携することにより、圧倒的な組織力を実現。環境の変化に対しても、組織全体で柔軟かつ迅速に対応できています。 （4）教育力 企業の成長には人材育成が不可欠だと考え、多くの経営資源を投じ、充実した研修制度を整えました。新人社員研修をはじめ、2年目社員研修、店長研修など、各キャリアにあわせた段階的な研修でしっかりサポート。その他、海外研修や社外研修など、様々な学びの場をご用意しています。 #働き方は3つの中から選択可能 -全国転勤型のナショナル社員 -転勤範囲に制限があるリージョナル社員 -転居を伴う転勤がないローカル社員 キャリアアップに有利な働き方、家事や育児と両立しやすい働き方など、社員の働きやすさとやりがいの両方を実現できるような働き方をご用意しており、自分の生活や将来のビジョンにあわせて選択可能です。また、毎年働き方の変更ができるため、ライフステージがかわっても無理なく働き続けることができます。 #手厚い福利厚生も魅力のひとつ -出産・育児支援に力を入れています。復職率は95.2%！早番固定や休業直前の部署への復帰など、職場復帰した後のフォローも万全です。 -勤務先により社宅制度の利用が可能！費用面の会社負担だけでなく、会社側でお部屋探しをしたり、家具や家電が完備しているなど、日々の仕事に影響がほとんどなく引っ越しをすることができます。帰省の費用も補助いたします。 -入社7ヶ月目よりサマーバケーション休暇を取得可能です（取得期間は5/21～9/20)。家族との旅行やご自身の趣味の時間に充てるなど、ゆっくりとリフレッシュすることができる制度です。 クスリのアオキイータウンとなみ店では、ナショナル社員として活躍してくださる登録販売者を募集しています。お客様と接するお仕事なので、明るく元気な対応に努められることが最低条件！「次の主役は、私です。」そんな熱意をもって、輝かしい未来を自分の手で切り開きませんか？あなたのご応募をお待ちしています。 特徴: 社会保険完備 / 週休2日 / 育児支援あり / ボーナス・賞与あり / 交通費支給 / 自動車運転免許 / 研修制度あり / ドラッグストア 給与の備考: ■大卒・修士卒 月給230,000円～ ・基本給 150,000円～ ・一律キャリア手当 30,000円 ・一律転勤手当 20,000円 ・一律遅番手当 20,000円 ・登録販売者手当 10,000円 ■高卒・短大・専門卒 月給210,000円～ ・基本給 150,000円～ ・一律キャリア手当 10,000円 ・一律転勤手当 20,000円 ・一律遅番手当 20,000円 ・登録販売者手当 10,000円 ■諸手当（会社規定による） ・役割手当 ・時間外勤務手当 ・休日勤務手当 ・通勤手当 ・深夜勤務手当 ・単身赴任手当 等 昇給 年1回（7月） 賞与 年2回（7月・12月）※業績連動型賞与 【ナショナル社員の年収例】 ・一般社員（高卒・高専卒・短大卒・専門卒） 月給210,000円～（年収300万円～） ・一般社員・医薬品登録販売者（大卒） 月給230,000円～（年収342万円～） ・店長 月給253,000～285,000円（年収400万～500万円） ・SV（スーパーバイザー） 月給310,000～320,000円（年収520万円） ・係長 月給230,000～330,000円（年収368万～580万円） ・バイヤー 月給320,000～330,000円（年収520万～700万円） ・課長 月給340,000～360,000円（年収620万～820万円） ※当社は職務給制度を導入しています。職務給とは勤続年数や年齢に関係なく、職務内容に応じて給与が支払われます。 キャリアアップにより報酬も明確です。 ※試用期間 入社後6ヶ月間（試用期間中は休職制度の適用なし。その他の条件は本採用時と同じ）

※固定残業代なし 勤続支援金: 正職員:6,000円 【施設情報】 施設名: クスリのアオキイータウンとなみ店 勤務地: 富山県砺波市三島町11番17号 JR城端線 砺波駅から徒歩で7分 【選考プロセス】 [1] ジョブメドレーの応募フォームよりご応募ください

1次選考：応募後に画面のメッセージより、履歴書、職務経歴書をご送付ください。 ↓ [2] 2次選考：選考会

title: Rotor Wing Pilot - Located in Hobbs, NM
description:
Located in Hobbs, NM

Job Description

 If your passion is flying and you want to work in an environment where every second counts - contact us today!

Increased Wages as of Jul 8 '22!

15K Sign on Bonus

40K Retention Bonus after 3 years

24% Geo Modifier

On Duty Housing

We're hiring a Helicopter Pilot to provide medical air transportation services to our customers. Scheduled shifts run seven consecutive days on and off . Safety is a key pillar of our services

Responsibilities
  • Working with a team of medical experts to safely transport customers to and from locations and facilities
  • Ensure aircraft readiness for flight dispatches as described in the appropriate manuals, including all FAR and company requirements, and aircraft cleanliness duties
  • Maintain accurate company and regulatory documentation and record keeping
  • Effectively communicate and collaborate with dispatch, flight crews, facilities, and partners

  • Accountable to maintain required certifications and ongoing training
Minimum Requirements
  • Current Rotorcraft FAA Commercial Certificate
  • Helicopter instrument rating
  • Current FAA Class II Medical Certificate
  • 2,000 Total Flight Hours
  • 1,500 Helicopter Hours
  • 1,000 Helicopter PIC Hours
  • 1,000 Hours Turbine

B407 Experience Preferred

 Please upload your Pilot License and FAA Medical Certificate

Why Choose Med-Trans? As a leader in air medical care, Med-Trans is one of Global Medical Response 's (GMR) family of solutions. Our GMR teams deliver compassionate, quality medical care, primarily in the areas of emergency and patient relocation services. View the stories on how our employees provide care to the world at www.AtaMomentsNotice.com . title: Commercial Account Executive - Central
description:
At Elastic, we see endless possibility in a world of endless data. And we use the power of search to help people and organizations turn that possibility into results. Elastic is the leading platform for search-powered solutions. With solutions in Enterprise Search, Observability, and Security, we help improve customer and employee search experiences, keep critical applications running smoothly, and protect against cyber threats. Elastic enables organizations worldwide to use the power of Elastic, including Netflix, Uber, BBC, Microsoft, and thousands of others.


Elastic was built on a foundation of being free and open, which trickles down to how we work. We’re a distributed organization and have been from the beginning. Being distributed isn’t just a way of doing business—it’s a mentality that is at the core of our culture.


Elastic is searching for a Commercial Account Executive to expand our Commercial customer accounts. Our Commercial Account Executives are individual contributors, focused on building new business and growing the Elastic footprint within accounts of up to 4,000 employees and ensuring our customers are successfully leveraging Elastic cloud solutions across their organization. Are you ready to help users tackle their hardest problems through the power of search? If so, we’d love to hear from you!


What You Will Be Doing:


  • Building awareness and driving demand for Elastic solutions within new Commercial accounts, by helping users and customers derive value from their data sets
  • Serving as an evangelist for our Open Source offerings while communicating and demonstrating the capabilities of our commercial features
  • Uncovering new and diverse use cases to enable our users to work smarter, not harder
  • Collaborating across Elastic business functions to ensure a seamless customer experience
  • Working thoughtfully with customers to identify new business opportunities, managing through the sales cycle and closing complex transactions
  • Building a robust business plan through community, customer and partner ecosystems to achieve significant Elastic growth within your accounts


What You Bring With You:


  • A track-record of success in selling SaaS subscriptions into net new complex accounts, demonstrated by overachievement of quota and strong customer references
  • A deep understanding and preferably experience selling into the ecosystem we live in, including Enterprise Search, Logging, Security, APM and Cloud
  • The ability to build relationships and credibility with both Developers and Executives
  • Predictability and accurate forecasting capabilities using SFDC
  • An appreciation for the Open Source go-to-market model and the community of users who rely on our solutions every single day
  • Previous experience selling into the Enterprise accounts included in this territory


Bonus Points:


  • Previous experience selling in an Open Source model


Additional Information - We Take Care Of Our People


As a distributed company, diversity drives our identity. Whether you’re looking to launch a new career or grow an existing one, Elastic is the type of company where you can balance great work with great life. Your age is only a number. It doesn’t matter if you’re just out of college or your children are; we need you for what you can do.


We strive to have parity of benefits across regions and while regulations differ from place to place, we believe taking care of our people is the right thing to do.


  • Competitive pay based on the work you do here and not your previous salary
  • Health coverage for you and your family in many locations
  • Ability to craft your calendar with flexible locations and schedules for many roles
  • Generous number of vacation days each year
  • Double your charitable giving - We match donations 1:1 up to $1500 USD (or local currency equivalent)
  • Up to 40 hours each year to use toward volunteer projects you love.
  • Embracing parenthood with minimum of 16 weeks of parental leave

title: Manager, Customer Service Contracts (Onsite)
description:
This position manages a team of professionals in Customer Service Warranty in Rockford, IL. You will own customer satisfaction, serving as the face of our organization, interacting with internal and external customers daily to provide excellent customer service.

Onsite
  • The work associated with this position will be performed onsite

Primary Responsibilities
  • Manages a team of primarily intermediate professionals, with freedom to determine how assignments are completed (e.g., objectives and approaches to completing work).
  • Sets objectives and guides others on execution/approach for achievement of operational results.
  • Problems faced are difficult and involve consideration of multiple variables.
  • Explains policies, practices, and procedures and may influence others.
  • Coordinates and manages all levels of customer service center representatives to ensure customers’ expectations are met.
  • Provides technical guidance to staff on the systems, standards, and mechanisms put in place to provide and monitor customer service performance and ensure that activities are efficient, consistent, reliable, and high quality.
  • Coordinates and liaises with product line management to ensure that customer service strategies and activities are integrated with business unit objectives.
  • Oversees difficult client problem and issue resolution to ensure customer needs are met or exceeded.
  • Performs performance reviews on addressing and resolving customer problems and outlines to improve performance and services.
  • Summarizes the findings from customer correspondence and product issues identified by the customer service team to ensure issues are discussed and resolved. Interprets the organization-wide customer service strategy and policies and procedures specific to daily activities of customer service center representatives to ensure smooth operations of customer services work.

Basic Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s degree and 8 years of relevant experience OR
  • Advanced Degree in a related field and a minimum of 5 years of relevant experience OR
  • In absence of a degree, 12 years of relevant experience is required
  • Must be a U.S. Citizen

    • Preferred Qualifications
    • MBA, JD or related
    • Previous experience working on military contracts (FAR-12)
    • Previous experience working in the aerospace industry
    • Demonstrated history of leadership and managing a team

    Collins Aerospace, a Raytheon Technologies company, is a leader in technologically advanced and intelligent solutions for the global aerospace and defense industry. Collins Aerospace has the capabilities, comprehensive portfolio and expertise to solve customers’ toughest challenges and to meet the demands of a rapidly evolving global market.

    We make modern flight possible for millions of travelers and our military every second. Our major product lines are on-board virtually every aircraft flying. Be it keeping passengers safe with our emergency power generation systems or creating a positive in-flight experience through reliable cabin pressure controls and quieter engines, Power & Controls focuses on delivering a best-in-class experience to our customers. We hire the top people in the industry. Their ideas drive our performance, and their integrity keeps our customers happy. Join us as we take flight!

    Collins Aerospace Diversity & Inclusion Statement

    Diversity drives innovation; inclusion drives success. We believe a multitude of approaches and ideas enable us to deliver the best results for our workforce, workplace, and customers. We are committed to fostering a culture where all employees can share their passions and ideas so we can tackle the toughest challenges in our industry and pave new paths to limitless possibility.

    WE ARE REDEFINING AEROSPACE.

    Please consider the following role type definitions as you apply for this role.

    Onsite: Employees who are working in Onsite roles will work primarily onsite. This includes all production and maintenance employees, as they are essential to the development of our products.

    Hybrid: Employees who are working in Hybrid roles will work regularly both onsite and offsite. Ratio of time working onsite will be determined in partnership with your leader.

    Remote: Employees who are working in Remote roles will work primarily offsite (from home). An employee may be expected to travel to the site location as needed.

    Regardless of your role type, collaboration and innovation are critical to our business and all employees will have access to digital tools so they can work with colleagues around the world – and access to Collins sites when their work requires in-person meetings.

    Some Of Our Competitive Benefits Package Includes
    • Medical, dental, and vision insurance
    • Three weeks of vacation for newly hired employees
    • Generous 401(k) plan that includes employer matching funds and separate employer retirement contribution, including a Lifetime Income Strategy option
    • Tuition reimbursement
    • Student Loan Repayment Program
    • Life insurance and disability coverage
    • Optional coverages you can buy: Pet Insurance, Home and Auto, additional life insurance, accident insurance, critical illness insurance, group legal, ID theft protection
    • Birth, adoption, parental leave benefits
    • Ovia Health, fertility and family planning
    • Adoption Assistance
    • Autism Benefit
    • Employee Assistance Plan, including up to 10 free counseling sessions
    • Healthy You Incentives, wellness rewards program
    • Doctor on Demand, virtual doctor visits
    • Bright Horizons, child and elder care services
    • Teladoc Medical Experts, second opinion program
    •  And more! 

    Nothing matters more to Collins Aerospace than our strong ethical and safety commitments. As such, all U.S. positions require a background check, which may include a drug screen.

    Note
    • Background check and drug screen required (every external new hire in the U.S.)
    • Drug Screen only performed on re-hires who have been gone for more than 1 year

    At Collins, the paths we pave together lead to limitless possibility. And the bonds we form – with our customers and with each other -- propel us all higher, again and again.

    Apply now and be part of the team that’s redefining aerospace, every day.

    Employee Referral Eligible

    Raytheon Technologies is An Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status, age or any other federally protected class.

title: EHS Coordinator
description:
Requirements
  • Preferably Bilingual in English and Spanish
  • Hands on, and willingness to spend time on the production floor with workers.
  • Knowledge of EHS Management Systems.
  • Well-organized and proficient at reviewing and editing documentation.
  • Ability to maintain attention to detail while executing multiple tasks and meet department expectations.
  • Maintain control and confidentiality of information as necessary.
  • Knowledge of safety and health standards, rules, regulations, incident investigation techniques, and a rough understanding of safety culture building skills.
  • Verbal and written communication skills, with good problem-solving skills.
  • Understanding of proactive vs. reactive metrics.
  • Proficient in the use of Microsoft Word, Excel.
  • Knowledge of OSHA regulations related to machine guarding, hazard communication, fall protection, and LOTO.
  • Openness to working varied hours.
  • Must be able to adhere to company policy, safety rules and regulations, and wear PPE.
ProAmpac is a leading global flexible packaging company with comprehensive product offerings. We provide creative packaging solutions, industry-leading customer service and award-winning innovation to a diverse global marketplace. We are guided in our work by five core values that are the basis for our success: Integrity, Intensity, Innovation, Involvement and Impact. We Collaborate, so You Succeed. We are moving flexible packaging forward by redefining innovation through collaboration within our own company and with our customers and suppliers.

We Currently have an opening for a 2 nd shift Environmental Health and Safety Coordinator at our Walden, NY facility!We offer a competitive salary and excellent benefits package including production bonuses and a sign on bonus!

Benefits : 401(k), 401(k) Matching, Dental Insurance, Employee Assistance Program, Flexible Spending Account, Health Insurance, Life Insurance, Paid Time Off, Parental Leave, Referral Program, Vision Insurance .

Shift : 2 nd shift Monday through Friday 4pm 1am

Essential Duties And Responsibilities
  • Conduct initial and recurrent on the job training for production employees demonstrating workplace safety, and best practices on the production floor.
  • Partner with individual departments to determine deliverables, expectations and risks, to include specific training for staff as required.
  • Daily review of Operational Excellence program compliance: Ex. Day by Hour boards, 5S programs, waste tracking documents and other programs as required.
  • Monitoring of Environmental, Health and Safety compliance. Daily monitoring of PPE, housekeeping, chemical container labeling, and general workplace safety regulations.
  • Provide additional or recurrent training as required.
  • Maintains organization of document filing system, binders and electronic spreadsheets for tracking purposes.
  • Assist with training and enforcement of OSHA safety rules in the production area.
  • Assist with proactive identification of EHS hazards and administration of unsafe condition reporting.
  • Assist with the implementation of employee engagement opportunities; answer questions about how to fill out forms and help to identify opportunities to be proactively engaged in safety.
  • Assist with ongoing EHS projects, such as machine guarding improvement, fall protection opportunities, and near-miss reporting etc.
  • Assist in the development of a risk assessment program/ analysis, best practices and standard work documents (5S, A3 analysis).

title: Masonry Superintendent
description:
• Join a top restoration company in Michigan|$2,000 Sign on Bonus


About Our Client

Our client focuses on building restoration and moisture management, of commercial projects and specializing in concrete, masonry (brick & block), waterproofing, and caulking. They are a specialty contractor, that does a lot of self-perform work. Due to aggressive expansion, they are looking for a masonry superintendent.

Job Description

Key Responsibilities for the Masonry Superintendent include:
  • Small and medium-sized projects. ($10,000 to $450,000) which range from a few days to multi-weeks, dependent on the project. Private owners to large GCs that work on multi-unit residential, schools, churches, transportation centers, retail, and/or industrial.
  • Management of foreman and crews for project delivery
  • In the field: delivering results and training team members.
  • All work in SE Michigan, no extended travel.

MPI does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, marital status, or based on an individual's status in any group or class protected by applicable federal, state or local law. MPI encourages applications from minorities, women, the disabled, protected veterans and all other qualified applicants.

The Successful Applicant

The successful Masonry Superintendent candidate will have:
  • Technical masonry expertise/knowledge (brick & block) with a minimum of 5 years of experience in the commercial construction, self-perform sector.
  • Proven ability to manage foreman and crews to deliver results.
  • Track record of project delivery on schedule and within budget while meeting customer requirements.
  • Champion of safety in all efforts and reinforces teams.
What's on Offer

On offer for a Masonry Superintendent candidate is:
  • A competitive base salary ranging from $70,000 - $100,000+ dependent on applicant experience
  • Fully covered health plan - medical, vision, dental, effective after 30 days of employment
  • 401K, company match to 5%
  • 4 Weeks paid time off
  • Sick time
  • Paid company holidays
  • Signing bonus $2000 (50% after 30 days of employment, 50% after 60 days of employment)
  • Assigned company vehicle for use, including gas and maintenance.
  • Cell phone and computer
  • Paid maternity and paternity leave
Contact: Evan Fortenberry

title: Pharmacy Tech
description:
• Overview* Saint Joseph Hospital is a 433-bed facility located in Lexington Kentucky. Founded in 1877 a small group of Sisters of Charity of Nazareth in Kentucky led by Sister Euphrasia Stafford began their health ministry. Their mission was to provide compassionate care to the poor and underserved – a tradition still carried out today. Saint Joseph Hospital primarily serves central and eastern Kentucky with a full range of services including distinguished awards for cardiology orthopedics and stroke care. CHI Saint Joseph Health supports 5000 active employees 8 hospitals specialty clinics and a Medical Group with more than 200 locations across Central and Eastern KY. CommonSpirit Health was formed by the alignment of Catholic Health Initiatives (CHI) and Dignity Health in 20
  • With our combined resources CommonSpirit is committed to building healthy communities advocating for those who are poor and vulnerable and innovating how and where healing can happen both inside our hospitals and out in the community. *Responsibilities* JOB SUMMARY / PURPOSE
Performs the manual technical tasks involved with the proper storage, distribution, packaging and labeling of drugs, associated record keeping and patient charging systems. Works under the supervision of a Registered Pharmacist. Follows proper procedures for the operation of equipment and use of supplies. Maintains and coordinates systems to ensure that pharmacy operations run efficiently on a day-to-day basis.

ESSENTIAL KEY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Assists pharmacist in providing pharmaceutical care to include (but not limited to): a. Preparing, filling and distributing medication b. Screening phone calls/orders and alerting the pharmacist to patient-specific data
  • Prepares labels with medication name, strength, lot number and expiration date.
  • Performs monthly patient care area inspections and reports as assigned by the manager.
  • Completes charges/credits daily for billing.
  • Maintains the various work areas of the department and equipment/utensils in a neat, clean, and orderly appearance.
  • Restocks special care stock supplies (i.e. emergency drugs to crash carts and heart carts) under pharmacist supervision.
  • Performs duties in documented accordance with requirements of all regulatory and governing bodies. Mandatory education from a system and department level is completed.
  • Safe handling/disposal / packaging for Transport of Pharmaceutical Waste/ Hazardous Materials/Bio- Hazardous Regulated Medical Waste. 1) Completes the Resource Conservation Recovery Act (RCRA) and Hazardous Waste education during employee orientation. 2) Tri –annually education for the D.O.T training. 3) is knowledgeable of the process for identifying the proper waste stream and uses the appropriate container to dispose of waste. 4) Knowledgeable regarding the process to contact the emergency response coordinator for hazardous waste/pharmaceutical release/spill clean-up.
  • Other duties as assigned by management. *Qualifications* Required Education for Staff Job Levels High school/GED
Required Licensure and Certifications Registered or eligible to register as pharmacy technician with the State Board of Pharmacy Examiners

Required Minimum Knowledge, Skills and Abilities Knowledge of the standards, techniques and tools relating to pharmaceutical patient care. Knowledge of the regulatory requirements applicable to pharmaceutical patient care. Knowledge of the standards, procedures and tools relating to an automated medication distribution system. Ability to mix oral powders and compounded drugs and to prepare intravenous admixture and other parental drugs. Ability to understand and use/apply I.V. admixture, automated distribution systems, outpatient services and decentralized pharmacy services. Knowledge of mathematical functions, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, basic algebra and calculations. Knowledge of the sources and availability of medications, bio-technology products, pharmaceutical supplies and equipment and related items. Ability to understand and apply standards, procedures and techniques to the work assignment. Ability to identify and resolve discrepancies in a timely and effective manner. Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships as required by the duties of the position. Adequate conversational English is required in order that the individual be able to take direction from management, understand how to complete job tasks, communicate adequately with patients and co-workers as necessary, understand and follow safety guidelines, and organizational policies. Ability to use office equipment and automated systems/applications/ software at an acceptable level.

title: Accounting - Tax Documentation Clerk
description:
Genesis10 is seeking a Tax Documentation Clerk for a 6-month contract position with a financial services client located in Pittsburgh, PA. This position is 100% onsite.

Summary:
 Genesis10 is seeking a Tax Documentation Clerk who will work on documentation requirements regarding mailings, filing, copying, and scanning as needed.

Responsibilities:
  • Input tax documentation and reporting information into relevant tax systems (DOORS, TrustEase).
  • Identify/locate required information for input into spreadsheets.
  • Help with administrative duties such as filing.

Qualifications:
  • Must be proficient in Microsoft Excel and data entry.
  • Must be able to accurately distinguish alphanumeric characters, be detail-oriented, and follow instructions carefully.
  • Will consider someone with financial experience over a degree.

If you have the described qualifications and are interested in this exciting opportunity, apply today!

title: Engenheiro Têxtil

location: Embu das Artes, São Paulo, Brazil
description:
Elaborar desenhos de projetos de estruturas metálicas e confecção (em 3D e 2D bem como LTs (Listas técnicas de materiais).

Emitir desenhos e Lts para fabricação de produção e protótipos.

Organizar e padronizar desenhos e Lts conforme procedimentos.

Avaliar informações técnicas de projetos.

title: MS Exchange Engineer
description:
Our client a prominent Law Firm in South Carolina is seeking a Messaging Engineer to join their team.

Primary Responsibilities

Maintain the firm's Microsoft Exchange mail server infrastructure including responding to incidents, developing documentation, troubleshooting issues, measuring capacity, monitoring logs, and applying patches/updates.

Role will work closely with other teams in the dept such as Server Admins, Storage, Network, and Security.

Must have strong knowledge of MS Windows Enterprise environments and Active Directory.

Requirements

5+ years of experience as an MS Exchange Admin in an enterprise environment including hands on server installations and upgrades.

5+ years Windows Server administration experience.

Microsoft MTA, MCSA, MCSE preferred, ITILv3 certification preferred, Bachelors degree, Expereince with Lync/Skype, Active Directory, Malware/anti-spam/anit-virus and archiving solutions.

Experience administering Mobile Device Management S/W (Mobile Iron, AirWatch, etc.)

Strong skills within an Exchange Multi-Role environment leveraging high availability designs

Advanced level PowerShell scripting and implementation skills.

Strong understanding of alerting and event management.

Strong expertise and troubleshooting experience with SMTP, TCP/IP, DNS and some level of experience with network troubleshooting.

title: Engenheiro de Produção
description:
Revisão e definição de processos da nossa fábrica e consequentemente acelerar nossa expansão.

Essa pessoa terá que analisar os históricos e estratégia de vendas, estabelecer mapas de produção e garantir sua execução no prazo e com a qualidade exigida em cada processo/receita. Formado em Engenharia da Produção.

title: Volunteer: Maxillofacial Surgeon
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This is not a job posting. Instead, it is an asynchronous volunteer opportunity where you will answer student questions online.

Volunteer from your desk at any time: Students want to know what it's like to become a maxillofacial surgeon!

Young people want to know what it's like to be you and it just takes a minute for you to tell them right from your desk.

CareerVillage.org is looking for professionals in several fields to answer questions from students about their career interests. It’s hard to find reliable, personalized career advice, particularly for underserved youth who don’t have networks and connections to rely on. CareerVillage is a nonprofit whose mission is to democratize access to career advice for underserved youth. We crowdsource personalized advice for 6M learners by engaging with professionals like yourself to help answer their questions.

Sign up to answer questions, and we’ll notify you when there are relevant questions for you to answer.

In the time it takes to send an email, you could write the piece of advice that thousands of young people can use to change their lives. Signing up is quick and easy with LinkedIn or via email, and allows us to direct only the most relevant questions to you based on your industry. Join 100,000 other professionals in giving advice to the next generation. Volunteer with us today!
  • Location: Anyplace with an internet connection.
  • Who you'll be helping: Underserved high school students, especially those interested in becoming a maxillofacial surgeon.
  • How you'll help: We'll email you questions from students. You can answer them online.
  • Time commitment: No long-term commitment. Giving a piece of advice takes about 10 minutes.
To begin, please click the "Apply" button on this LinkedIn volunteer post.

LinkedIn for Good Volunteering

title: Professional Engineer PM - Transportation/Advanced Planning - San Antonio, TX
description:
Professional Engineer PM - Transportation/Advanced Planning - San Antonio, TX

Halff has an immediate opening for a Transportation/Advanced Planning Project Engineer/Manager in San Antonio, TX. The ideal candidate would have some TxDOT Advance Planning experience. This position offers an excellent career development opportunity for someone looking to grow with Halff, with potential for not only business and personal growth, but ownership in the firm.

The successful candidate should have experience working on multi-discipline TxDOT projects and be able to oversee/lead transportation planning project development. In addition to project delivery responsibilities, candidates must demonstrate the ability to manage personnel, budgets, schedule and sub consultants.

Professional Engineer Project Manager - Transportation/Advanced Planning Requirements
  • Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Civil Engineering
  • 5+ years of experience in transportation advance planning and schematic project delivery
  • TxDOT experience is a must
  • PE license in Texas
  • Ability to manage multiple projects, and supervise technical staff
  • Strong communication skills, both written and verbal
  • A positive attitude, be self-directed yet a team player, and have a focus on quality, integrity and success.
Company Overview

Halff is a mid-sized, employee-owned, diverse and multi-disciplined professional services firm. For more than 70 years, Halff has provided smarter solutions throughout the United States offering services in Architecture, Construction Services, Energy, Environmental, Geographic Information Systems, Intelligent Transportation Systems, Land and Site Development, Planning and Landscape Architecture, MEP Engineering, Public Works, Right of Way, Structural Engineering, Subsurface Utility Engineering/Utility Coordination, Surveying, Transportation, Water Resources and Water/Wastewater.

Halff has offices in the following locations:

Arkansas: Bentonville, Fort Smith, Little Rock and North Little Rock

Florida: Chipley, Jacksonville, Miramar Beach, Panama City Beach, Tallahassee, Tampa and Tavares

Louisiana: Baton Rouge and Shreveport

Oklahoma: Oklahoma City

Texas: Austin, Brownsville, Conroe, Corpus Christi, Flower Mound, Fort Worth, Frisco, Houston, Midland, McAllen, Richardson, San Antonio and Tyler

We offer excellent benefits including medical, dental, prescription, life insurance, long-term and short-term disability insurance, paid time off and holiday pay, Traditional and Roth 401(k) plans, Employee Stock Ownership Plan, Health Savings Account, 529 College Savings Plan, Flexible Spending, an Employee Assistance Plan and more.

Salary is competitive and commensurate with experience.

Halff Associates is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, disability, or veteran status.

title: *Immediate Hire* General Production Worker
description:
• Description:* Tribar Manufacturing is a molding company. They handle battery watering systems, interior trim, badges, and injection molded parts. JOB DESCRIPTION: These individuals will be racking car letters onto a conveyor belt to be painted (Example the J-E-E-P off the front of a jeep). The conveyor hangs between their shoulders and waste. They will either be racking the parts to be painted, or unracking them after they have been painted. They will be working on a team of about 20 individuals. PLANT 1 & PLANT 3 (PAINT) JOB DUTIES:
  • Loading and unloading parts on and off the conveyor
  • Racking the conveyor
  • Racking small vehicle badges
  • All parts weigh between 1 oz-10 lbs (all under 10 lbs)
  • Inspecting the parts
  • Faulty parts, pull off and put in a box PLANT 4 & 5 (CHROME PLATING) JOB DUTIES:
  • Load for chroming process
  • Racks are between knee to top of the head
  • Same parts and weight, they will just be chromed plating
  • May lift semi-truck grills (6lbs) fiber glass plastic SHIFTS:
  • Shift openings change daily, I will keep the SS updated, here is the list of them* PLANT 1 (50 hour work weeks)- Location 30517 Andersen Ct. Wixom MI 48393
  • 1st 6am-4pm M-F
  • 2nd 4PM-2:30AM M-F PLANT 2 (40 hour work weeks)
  • 1st 6am-2:30pm M-F
  • 2nd 2pm-10:30pm M-F
  • 3rd 10pm-6:30am Sun-Thurs PLANT 3 (60 hour work weeks)
  • 1st 4am-4pm M-F
  • 2nd 4pm-4am M-F PLANT 4 (40 hour work weeks)
  • 1st 5am-1pm M-F
  • 2nd 1pm-9pm M-F
  • 3rd 9pm-5am M-F PLANT 5 (32 hour work weeks)
  • 1st 5am-1pm Mon-Thurs
  • 2nd 1pm-9pm Mon-Thurs
  • 3rd 9pm-5am Mon-Thurs PLANT 6 (40 hour work weeks)
  • 1st 5am-1pm M-F
  • 2nd 1pm-9pm M-F
  • 3rd 9pm-5am M-F
  • Shifts are hard start and stop times, they will not make them stay over.*
  • Saturdays are rare, they will get a 1 week heads up if it is mandates, but usually they get volunteers*
  • Skills:* general labor, General production, Assembly, Packaging, Production, Inspection
  • Top Skills Details:* general labor
  • Additional Skills & Qualifications:* MUST HAVE:
  • Ability to work on feet all day
  • Good attitude
  • Experience Level:* Entry Level

About Aerotek:

We know that a company's success starts with its employees. We also know that an individual's success starts with the right career opportunity. As a Best of Staffing® Client and Talent leader, Aerotek's people-focused approach yields competitive advantage for our clients and rewarding careers for our contract employees. Since 1983, Aerotek has grown to become a leader in recruiting and staffing services. With more than 250 non-franchised offices, Aerotek's 8,000 internal employees serve more than 300,000 contract employees and 18,000 clients every year. Aerotek is an Allegis Group company, the global leader in talent solutions. Learn more at Aerotek.com. title: Clinical Trial Associate
description:
• This multinational pharmaceutical is looking to hire an expreinced CTA to join their innovative company and support their expansive pipeline! *
  • Responsibilities*
  • Collaborates on and supports CTM on required tasks prior to commencement of clinical trials that include, but are not limited to: clinical planning, protocol development, case report form (CRF) development, IRB submissions, investigator agreements, informed consent form (ICF) development, site selection, Trial Master File structure and preparation, and communication with clinical trial sites regarding administrative documentation, support materials and training
  • Supports CTM and clinical operations team to ensure compliance with FDA and other applicable international regulatory requirements and company standard operating procedures (SOPs) during all clinical investigations and post-market studies
  • Supports CTM and clinical operations in communication with clinical trial sites regarding study conduct, monitoring, logistical management of follow-up and close out study visits to ensure compliance with protocols and GCP requirements
  • Assists in tracking study specific payments
  • Top Skills Details:*
  • Clinical trial
  • Vendor management
  • TMF? Clinical documentation
  • Additional Skills & Qualifications:* Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s degree in a health profession or science
  • At least 2 years of on-going clinical trials experience
  • Demonstrated proficiency in knowledge of GCPs and knowledge of FDA regulatory requirements
  • 1- 4 years of CTA experience

About Actalent:

Actalent connects passion with purpose. Our scalable talent solutions and services capabilities drive value and results and provide the expertise to help our customers achieve more. title: 计算机视觉算法工程师
description: 该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责： 1. 智能驾驶领域视觉算法研究， 包括但不限于检测、分割、建图、定位、 标定等； 2. 算法设计训练、调优、量化、调试等工作； 3. 协助软件人员在嵌入式平台上 CPU/NPU 实现算法移植； 4. 算法在平台上改进，针对实际场景持续优化。 任职要求： 1. 计算机软件相关专业，硕士及以上学历，2 年以上工作经验，较强的图像处理或计算机视觉背景； 2. 扎实的数学基础，熟悉计算机视觉、深度学习等算法开发； 3. 熟练掌握 C、 C++、 Python 语言；熟悉 MATLAB/OpenCV； 4. 具备良好的学习能力，强烈的主动性和责任心； 5. 具备良好的英语阅读能力。

title: Gerente de Operaciones
description:
Liderar y llevar a la compañía en Costa Rica a ser el distribuidor #1 de aires acondicionados, refrigeración, repuestos, partes e insumos en el mercado costarricense.


Requisitos:

  • Ingeniero (a) mecánico, eléctrico o afines.
  • Maestría en Administración de empresas (Deseable).
  • Edad: 28 a 50 años.
  • Experiencia como Gerente General o de Operaciones al menos 3 años.
  • Experiencia en empresas familiares (Deseable)
  • Experiencia en empresas distribuidoras o afines de aire acondicionado y refrigeración. (Requerido)
  • Conocimientos en Aire acondicionado. (Requerido)
  • Experiencia en liderar equipos de trabajo.
  • Excel Avanzado.
  • Competencias requeridas: Proactivo (a), capacidad de análisis y toma de decisiones, liderazgo, honestidad, ética.
  • Inglés intermedio (Deseable)
  • Visa Americana (Deseable)


Responsabilidades:

1- Cumplir con las metas y margen de venta.

2- Mantener en los límites establecidos los gastos operativos.

3- Mantener una sana cartera de cuentas por cobrar.

4- Mantener una sana cartera de cuentas por pagar.

5- Maximizar las utilidades de la compañía.

6- Liderar, motivar y supervisar al talento humano bajo su responsabilidad.

7- Planificación estratégica de la operación de la empresa en Costa Rica..

8- Desarrollar otras líneas de producto.

9- Elaborar informes de las gestiones solicitadas por el Gerente Regional.


Se ofrece:

-Salario atractivo y bonos por cumplimiento de metas.

-Prestaciones de ley, celular corporativo, desgaste vehicular y gasolina.


Ubicación: Guachipelín de Escazú, San José, Costa Rica.

Modalidad: Presencial. Ocasionalmente, puede ser 3 días cada 2 meses en CR.

Disponibilidad para viajar a EE.UU a ferias comerciales cuando lo amerite.

Horario: Lunes a viernes de 7:30 a.m. a 5:30 p.m. con flexibilidad.


Nota:

Puedes aplicar desde cualquier provincia de Costa Rica.

Si estas en LATAM y cumples con los requisitos puedes aplicar

si estas dispuesto (a) a reubicarte en Costa Rica


Interesados enviar hoja de vida a talento@see-talent.com e indícanos tu

expectativa salarial.

title: Heftruckchauffeur
description:
Ben jij een echte aanpakker en vind je het leuk om op de heftruck te rijden?

In deze functie ben jij verantwoordelijk voor het correct laden en lossen van de vrachtwagens. Tevens draag jij zorg voor het netjes wegzetten van de rollen in de productielijn en verplaatsen goederen middels de heftruck.

Ervaring is een pré, maar zeker niet noodzakelijk!

Wij bieden
  • Werken in een hecht team;
  • Een bruto uurloon van €12,43 (bij 21 jaar en ouder) exclusief een mooie ploegentoeslag (!);
  • Volop doorgroeimogelijkheden en kans op overname;
  • Reiskostenvergoeding;
Wij vragen

Wij Vragen Van Jou
  • Heftruck certificaat, of bereid om deze te halen
  • Een afgeronde mbo-opleiding niveau 2
  • Minimaal 18 jaar i.v.m. de ploegendienst
  • Rijbewijs B + eigen vervoersmogelijkheden
  • Bereid om te werken in 3/4 ploegendienst
  • Indien nodig beschikbaar op zaterdag
Heb je nog vragen?

Vestiging Timing MKB Overijssel, Lisanne de Grip

088-5063035

Waar ga je werken?

Het bedrijf is één van de grootste tapijtproducenten van Europa met een productie van meer dan 115 miljoen m² textiele vloerbedekking op jaarbasis. Het is een familiebedrijf waar naast duurzaamheid, medewerkers hoog in het vaandel staan. Zij produceren onder andere tapijt, kunstgras en automatten voor klanten binnen en buiten Europa. Werken bij Condor betekent een bruto uurloon van € 12,43 exclusief ploegentoeslag (vanaf 21 jaar of ouder)!

title: In-Home Sales Consultant- Residential Water Treatment
description:
All About Water is currently seeking Residential Water Treatment Sales Consultant to join our team comprised of creative and energetic employees, who are dedicated to delivering the best customer service experience every day. Our water treatment consultants meet with customers and educate them on various water treatment options, analyze customers' water composition and treat customers with the utmost respect and attention.

We offer an excellent, comprehensive benefits package along with a company culture that can’t be beat! We strive to keep our employees happy and working consistently, built from providing years of superior service and strong leadership!

Earning potential $100k+/year! Our percentage earnings fall a few points higher than the national water industry average! PLUS industry leading benefits, PTO, 6 Paid Holidays per year + get paid to take your birthday off, 401(k) with Company match, and so much more!

All About Family Home Services, LLC is the recent merger of Collins Comfort Masters and All About Water. Collectively, we’ve been providing the Valley with reliable Air Conditioning, Heating, Plumbing, Indoor Air Quality, and Water Treatment services since 1974.

What Will I Do?
  • Analyze customers' water composition
  • Accurately diagnose the cause of water quality issues
  • Confidently quote each installation need to the customer
  • Be thorough in inspections, and accurate in quoting replacements or repairs
  • Confidently present product solutions using product knowledge and sales expertise
Do I have What it Takes?
  • 2+ years sales experience (water treatment highly desired)
  • Through understanding the water chemistry
  • Possess expertise within the Water Treatment Industry to help support and grow the business
  • An entrepreneurial spirit with extreme self-motivation and assertiveness.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

title: Bouwkundig werkvoorbereider (starter)
description:
• Het is een startersfunctie voor een afgestudeerde bouwkundige. Je werkt samen met een ervaren werkvoorbereider
  • Je bent mede verantwoordelijk voor de voorbereiding van diverse bouwprojecten
  • Het controleren van het tekenwerk en bestek en tekeningen van onderaannemers

  • Na een inwerkperiode en laat je jouw vakkundigheid en zelfstandigheid zien. Je groeit dan door naar bouwkundig werkvoorbereider.
  • Minimaal een opleiding mbo bouwkunde
  • Affiniteit met moderne contractvormen als BIM en Lean
  • Stage en werkervaring
  • Communicatief ben je sterk
  • Je ontwikkelt je zelf snel en bent leergierig
  • Oog voor detail

Organisatie- en afdelingsomschrijving

Voor een relatief nieuw en snel groeiende aannemer in de regio Kampen, zoek ik een startende werkvoorbereider. Je gaat nauw samenwerken met een ervaren werkvoorbereider. Je bent flexibel en leergierig. Na een inwerktraject bewijs je jouw zelfstandigheid en vakkundigheid. Je zult doorgroeien tot volwaardig werkvoorbereider. Ben jij ambitieus en hardwerkend? Heb jij minimaal een mbo diploma bouwkunde? Dan is deze functie wat voor jou! Bel me op 06 53 30 42 07. Je kan je belangstelling en je cv ook mailen naar qz@multiselect.nl.

Functie-informatie

Aanbod
  • Een goed salaris
  • Geweldige kans met doorgroei- en ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden bij een snel groeiend bouwbedrijf
  • Goede en heldere secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden

Functie-eisen
  • Minimaal een opleiding mbo bouwkunde

Solliciteren bij

Ben jij nieuwsgierig naar de functie van startende werkvoorbereider in Kampen? Ben jij leergierig en lijkt het jou leuk om te werken bij een snelgroeiend bouwbedrijf? Neem dan contact met mij op door mij te bellen op 06 53 30 42 07 of door mij je cv en eventuele vragen te mailen naar qz@multiselect.nl. Ik hoor graag van je!

Ik reageer

title: callcenter medewerker
description:
Als medewerker klantenservice ben je voornamelijk bezig met inkomende telefoontjes en mails van en klanten. Vanaf het moment dat iemand een bestelling geplaatst heeft in de webshop kunnen er verschillende vragen bij de klanten ontstaan. Het is belangrijk dat deze klanten op een goede manier te woord gestaan worden, zowel in woord als schrift.

Wij bieden

Salaris €11,70- €12,76

Arbeidsovereenkomst met een marktconform salaris met reiskostenvergoeding en goede secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden

Wij zoeken mensen voor de langere termijn. Vaste contracten horen daarbij

Mogelijkheid tot flexibiliteit in contracturen

Zowel werken in dagdienst, weekenden of avonden mogelijk

Een baan met volop mogelijkheden om je te ontwikkelen

Een functie binnen een ambitieus en nieuw team en een organisatie die maatschappelijk enorm betrokken is

Wij vragen

Je vindt het leuk om per mail en telefoon contact te hebben met klanten

Je vindt het leuk om vragen van klanten (zo snel mogelijk) te beantwoorden

Je staat sterk in je schoenen, kan niet tevreden klanten omzetten in tevreden klanten

Je bent oplossingsgericht en pakt problemen zelfstandig op

Je hebt een groot verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel en kunt snel schakelen tussen verschillende taken en systemen

Je beheerst ofwel de Duitse ofwel de Franse taal in woord en geschrift

Heb je nog vragen?

Vestiging Timing MKB Brabant Zuidoost-Limburg Noord, Chantal van Aanholt

088-5063045

Waar ga je werken?

Bij onze klant kunnen online winkels voor tuin-, terras- en balkonproducten hun verpakkings- en logistieke activiteiten volledig uitbesteden. Allereerst is onze klant een verpakkingsbedrijf dat gespecialiseerd is in het verpakken van tuinplanten en bomen in karton of pallets, voor verzending. Ze hebben de afgelopen jaren al ervaring opgedaan en doen dit tot tevredenheid van onze klanten.

About Travel Nurses, Inc.

Find Your Next Adventure!

At Travel Nurses, Inc., everything we do is to empower our healthcare professionals to excellence.

About Us

Nurses are the backbone of healthcare. And at Travel Nurses, Inc., nurses are the head and heart, as well. We are owned by OR Nurses Nationwide. Founded, owned and operated by nurses, we began our journey in 1988 staffing exclusively OR settings. Soon, we expanded to staffing all nurse specialties and allied professionals nationwide. America's leading national rating agency has identified us as the No. 1 travel nurse provider in 2017, and we made the list again in 2018. title: Dental Assistant
description:
Southern Dental Alliance is looking for a Dental Assistant to join our team!

Southern Dental Alliance is a dental support organization affiliated with 40+ practices in the Southeast. The lead doctors of each practice pursue aggressive growth and offer invaluable mentoring and support. The practices operate under eleven main practice identities

At Southern Dental Alliance – we want to be a community that people want to join. We are looking for long-term relationships with our teams, our patients, and our communities.

As a Dental Assistant, you will ensure the Dentists are set up for success prior to interfacing with patients and during patient procedures. The DA clearly communicates to Dentist – the patients’ needs/request and other education, procedures, diagnosis and treatment related matters prior to treatment. The DA perform a variety of patient care, office, and laboratory duties, in addition to performing work chair-side as Dentist examines and treat patients, and works proactively to ensure Dentist clinical/hygiene needs are met. The DA is responsible for making patients comfortable as they are seated in the dental chair, prepares patient for treatment, and obtains the accurate patient dental records. The DA is responsible for handing instruments and materials to Dentist and also responsible for keeping the patients' mouths dry and clear by using suction or other devices. The DA is responsible for sterilizing and disinfecting instruments and equipment, preparing trays of instruments for dental procedures, and instructing patients on postoperative and general oral health care.

Minimum Eligibility Requirements
  • High school diploma or GED.
  • Must be detail oriented and organized
  • Must possess excellent customer service skills and work well under pressure
  • Strong computer skills including Microsoft Office suite and desk top publishing
  • Ability to multi-task, meet deadlines, and work in a fast-paced environment
  • Ability to work independently as well as with a team
  • Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal skills
  • Must pass criminal background check
Preferred Education And Experience
  • 1 year experience as a Dental or Medical Assistant.
  • Certified Dental Assistant.
  • Use of dental/medical technology.
  • Ability to connect with patients.
  • Driven and works with a sense of urgency.
  • Has the ability to multi-task.
  • Professional, courteous and approachable demeanor.
  • Cerac Experience
Additional Eligibility Requirements
  • Current CPR certification.
  • Employee must submit to a post offer, pre-employment physical examination/medical history check.?
  • Employee may be required to submit to an annual Tuberculosis (TB) and Rubella screening.
We Offer
  • Competitive Pay and Bonus Potential
  • Medica, Vision and Dental coverage offered
  • Accident Coverage & Hospital Indemnity Coverage
  • Paid Holidays and Vacation Time
  • 401k, Life Insurance, Short and Long Term Disability
  • ID theft protection
  • Pet Insurance
  • Employee Discounts
VSM Management, LLC dba Southern Dental Alliance and all relevant Affiliates are Equal Opportunity Employers.

title: 歯科助手【即日勤務OK】
description:
大阪府泉佐野市で歯科助手を募集中！ 未経験ok,受付、アシスタントのお仕事☆週休2.5日でプライベートも充実◎綺麗な施設で快適勤務♪患者様の笑顔をつくる歯科助手のお仕事です！ 募集職種: 歯科助手 仕事内容: 受付業務 歯科医師や衛生士のアシスタント業務 滅菌業務 資格: 資格不問 高卒、短大、専門学校卒以上 ※高卒は経験必須 Word・Excelがある程度使用できる方 勤務時間: 勤務時間 月、火、水、金 8:40～13:20/14:20～19:10 土曜

8:40～13:20/14:20～18:20 (週40時間に調整) 祝日週は木曜日診療します ※休憩60分 【診療時間】 月、火、水、金

9:00～13:00/14:30～18:30 土曜

9:00～13:00/14:30～17:30 休日・休暇: 週休2.5日 日 祝 木が休日 福利厚生: ・車、バイク、自転車通勤可 ・社会保険完備（健康保険、厚生年金、雇用保険、労災保険） ・賠償責任保険 ・親睦会あり ・社内研修制度、社外研修への参加補助（費用） ・復職支援あり ・退職金制度あり（勤続3年以上） アピールポイント: #小北歯科医院をご紹介します 当院は「地域の皆様に信頼されるような医院作り」をモットーに、患者様とのコミュニケーションを重視した歯科治療を目指しています。現在、院長を始めとする5名のドクターのほか、歯科衛生士、受付スタッフ、アシスタントスタッフ、滅菌専任スタッフと充実のスタッフ構成で患者様をお迎えしています。スタッフ全員がスキルアップへの強い意欲を持っており、院内外の研修を積極的に実施。一般歯科のみならず歯周歯科や小児歯科、さらに口腔外科専門医との連携もあり、幅広い診療科目でさまざまなお悩みに対応しています。技術と設備、徹底した衛生管理によって、患者様の生涯を通じたお口の健康と食生活をお守りします。 #働きやすいのはもちろん、成長できる環境もしっかり整っています！ 新卒の方でも安心して成長できるよう、教育・研修に力を入れている当院。歯科の知識がまったくない方も、一から丁寧に指導いたしますのでご安心ください。また、福利厚生の充実にもしっかり注力。社会保険完備はもちろん、昇給賞与もアリ！産休・育休も取りやすい環境ですので、長期の勤務も安心です。 #こんな方を求めています 私たちは患者様とのコミュニケーションを大切にし、笑顔あふれる医院を一緒につくってくれる仲間を募集しています。医院スタッフはたくさんの人から頼りにされ、感謝されるお仕事です。やりがいのあるお仕事をとおしてご自身を成長させませんか？ご応募お待ちしております。 特徴: 一般歯科 / 審美歯科 / 矯正歯科 / 訪問歯科 / 小児歯科 / 口腔外科 / 予防歯科 / インプラント / 未経験可 / ブランク可 / 社会保険完備 / 車通勤可 / 育児支援あり / 残業ほぼなし / ボーナス・賞与あり / 交通費支給 / 扶養控除内考慮 / 新卒可 / レセプト / 事務 / 受付 / 退職金あり / 復職支援 / 研修制度あり / 歯周治療 / 入れ歯・補綴 / 即日勤務OK 給与の備考: ◆給与補足 短大卒、専門学校卒、経験あり高校卒:月給190000円～(試用期間6ヶ月、期間中月給180000円～) 大学卒以上：月給200000円～（試用期間6ヶ月、期間中月給190000円～) ◆諸手当 職務手当、昼手当、ミーティング手当は給与に含む 交通費全額支給 残業手当 ◆昇給・賞与 昇給 年1回 賞与 年2回 ◆その他 給与は前職、経験などを考慮し、優遇します。 固定残業代なし 勤続支援金: 正職員:6,500円 【施設情報】 施設名: 小北歯科医院 勤務地: 大阪府泉佐野市長滝847-5 阪和線(天王寺〜和歌山) 長滝駅から徒歩で約8〜9分 スタッフ構成: 院長 1名 医師 4名 歯科衛生士 院長名: 小北 雅史 院長略歴: 1972年

9:00～13:00/14:30～17:30 休日・休暇: 週休2.5日 日 祝 木が休日 福利厚生: ・車、バイク、自転車通勤可 ・社会保険完備（健康保険、厚生年金、雇用保険、労災保険） ・賠償責任保険 ・親睦会あり ・社内研修制度、社外研修への参加補助（費用） ・復職支援あり ・退職金制度あり（勤続3年以上） アピールポイント: #小北歯科医院をご紹介します 当院は「地域の皆様に信頼されるような医院作り」をモットーに、患者様とのコミュニケーションを重視した歯科治療を目指しています。現在、院長を始めとする5名のドクターのほか、歯科衛生士、受付スタッフ、アシスタントスタッフ、滅菌専任スタッフと充実のスタッフ構成で患者様をお迎えしています。スタッフ全員がスキルアップへの強い意欲を持っており、院内外の研修を積極的に実施。一般歯科のみならず歯周歯科や小児歯科、さらに口腔外科専門医との連携もあり、幅広い診療科目でさまざまなお悩みに対応しています。技術と設備、徹底した衛生管理によって、患者様の生涯を通じたお口の健康と食生活をお守りします。 #働きやすいのはもちろん、成長できる環境もしっかり整っています！ 新卒の方でも安心して成長できるよう、教育・研修に力を入れている当院。歯科の知識がまったくない方も、一から丁寧に指導いたしますのでご安心ください。また、福利厚生の充実にもしっかり注力。社会保険完備はもちろん、昇給賞与もアリ！産休・育休も取りやすい環境ですので、長期の勤務も安心です。 #こんな方を求めています 私たちは患者様とのコミュニケーションを大切にし、笑顔あふれる医院を一緒につくってくれる仲間を募集しています。医院スタッフはたくさんの人から頼りにされ、感謝されるお仕事です。やりがいのあるお仕事をとおしてご自身を成長させませんか？ご応募お待ちしております。 特徴: 一般歯科 / 審美歯科 / 矯正歯科 / 訪問歯科 / 小児歯科 / 口腔外科 / 予防歯科 / インプラント / 未経験可 / ブランク可 / 社会保険完備 / 車通勤可 / 育児支援あり / 残業ほぼなし / ボーナス・賞与あり / 交通費支給 / 扶養控除内考慮 / 新卒可 / レセプト / 事務 / 受付 / 退職金あり / 復職支援 / 研修制度あり / 歯周治療 / 入れ歯・補綴 / 即日勤務OK 給与の備考: ◆給与補足 短大卒、専門学校卒、経験あり高校卒:月給190000円～(試用期間6ヶ月、期間中月給180000円～) 大学卒以上：月給200000円～（試用期間6ヶ月、期間中月給190000円～) ◆諸手当 職務手当、昼手当、ミーティング手当は給与に含む 交通費全額支給 残業手当 ◆昇給・賞与 昇給 年1回 賞与 年2回 ◆その他 給与は前職、経験などを考慮し、優遇します。 固定残業代なし 勤続支援金: 正職員:6,500円 【施設情報】 施設名: 小北歯科医院 勤務地: 大阪府泉佐野市長滝847-5 阪和線(天王寺〜和歌山) 長滝駅から徒歩で約8〜9分 スタッフ構成: 院長 1名 医師 4名 歯科衛生士 院長名: 小北 雅史 院長略歴: 1972年

title: Survey Project Manager
description:
Survey Project Manager - Charlotte, NC

Westwood Professional Services, Inc.

Westwood Professional Services, Inc. is seeking a Survey Project Manager to join our team in Charlotte, NC. The Survey Project Manager will support the overall direction, coordination, implementation, execution, quality assurance/quality control and completion of professional survey services. Additionally, the role includes, training and mentoring of junior staff, client satisfaction, and business development under the direction of the Survey and Market Leaders within the Land Region and Division. Westwood has a highly experienced and dynamic team of individuals dedicated to providing high-level professional services to our clients.

Duties and Responsibilities
  • Work with the survey service leader and market leaders to create, monitor and meet a professional, service-specific education and staff development budget for the survey team.
  • Provide and execute an ongoing mentorship plan for junior staff of the survey team.
  • Stay current on service-specific trends, technology, software, hardware and equipment.
  • Drive value based on innovation.
  • Work with the survey service leader to establish, implement, monitor, and maintain procedures and quality standards for the survey group.
  • Ensure that survey work products have a consistent appearance across the local land survey team and are delivered efficiently.
  • Work with survey service leader and market leaders on staffing, utilization and workload as it relates to survey.
  • Work with the division survey service leader, survey service leader, and market leader to grow Westwood’s local and national land survey presence.
  • Support market-based business development by providing technical expertise and generating revenue.
  • Build, maintain and grow a strong culture for survey that aligns with the division’s goals, objectives and strategies and Westwood’s core values.
  • Ensures division, regional, and company policies and practices are consistently followed within the survey service.
  • Lead by example – display solid judgment, good values, trust, honesty, openness, and professionalism.
Required Experience
  • Professional Survey License – Licensed in State of the office. Additional states preferred.
  • Four-year degree preferred and 10-plus years of experience in a consulting business.
  • Must have multi-discipline experience, and a strong understanding of wind, solar, and power delivery projects.
  • Must have a strong background in project management.
  • Effective verbal communication is necessary and independent judgment is essential.
  • Proven leadership and supervisory skills.
  • Handle multiple priorities and projects well.
  • Thorough knowledge and experience in business development.
About Westwood Professional Services, Inc. (Westwood)

Westwood Professional Services Inc. (Westwood) was established in 1972 and has since become a leader in many of the markets it serves. Westwood is a full-service, multidiscipline professional engineering firm and serves wind, solar, power delivery, residential and commercial development, and public infrastructure clients and their projects from multiple offices across the U.S.

In 2021, Zweig Group ranked Westwood nationally at # 4 and #21 respectively on its Hot Firms and Best Firms to Work for lists. Zweig also awarded Westwood two national 2nd place awards for Marketing Excellence. Westwood also ranked consistently higher four years in a row on the Engineering News Record (ENR) list as a leading design firm in the country. The firm consistently ranks on industry top 25 lists and receives recognition for its involvement on award-wining projects nationwide.

Westwood provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. We believe that diverse backgrounds strengthen our business. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training.

title: Food & Grocery
description:
What You'll Do At

Why is Walmart America's leading grocery store? Our customers tell us one of the biggest reasons is our hard-working and happy-to-help fresh food and grocery associates. Join our food and grocery team and you will make important decisions about the quality of fruit and vegetables our customers eat and feed to their families.
  • Work in our deli and you'll be on the frontlines of customer service--your smile can make the difference between a good shopping experience and a great one.
  • In our bakery--you'll help a family have a great meal. You won't just decorate cakes--you'll help customers celebrate special moments.
  • Work in our dry grocery department and you will ensure customers find the items they are looking for.
No matter which fresh food or grocery area you work in, there are similarities in all departments. These include detailed cleaning of the shelves and department, checking and maintaining temperature control, verifying dates, and disposing of lesser quality food products.

If you have a passion or experience with fresh food or grocery, this is the job for you. Duties and Responsibilities
  • Help customers find the products they are looking for
  • Ensure high quality products are available in produce, deli, bakery, dairy, meat, and other departments
  • Pack ready-to-sell products in proper containers and stock displays
  • Prepare and serve ready-to-eat food
  • Assist customers in ordering cakes, fulfilling deli orders, or finding the right produce
  • Keep area clean, sanitized, and customer-ready
* For a complete list of duties and responsibilities, please see the actual job description.

#storejobs

About Walmart

At Walmart, we help people save money so they can live better. This mission serves as the foundation for every decision we make, from responsible sourcing to sustainability—and everything in between. As a Walmart associate, you will play an integral role in shaping the future of retail, tech, merchandising, finance and hundreds of other industries—all while affecting the lives of millions of customers all over the world. Here, your work makes an impact every day. What are you waiting for?

Walmart, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer- By Choice. We believe we are best equipped to help our associates, customers, and the communities we serve live better when we really know them. That means understanding, respecting, and valuing diversity- unique styles, experiences, identities, abilities, ideas and opinions- while being inclusive of all people.
