Self-motivated and willing to ask questions. Familiarity with spreadsheets and databases including Excel or FileMaker Pro. Typing and data entry skills preferred.

title: 研究经理
company_name: 上海飞观信息科技有限公司
company_universal_name: 上海飞观信息科技有限公司
description: 该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责： 1.负责调查研究项目的客户沟通与谈判； 2.负责把握客户调研项目需求的界定，参与研究方案的设计、撰写及项目投标工作； 3.统筹管理调查研究项目的整体运作，包括项目质量、进度、成本的控制； 4.负责参与撰写项目报告书，为客户分析解读数据与报告内容； 5.负责协调与其它部门及集团公司内部的工作，提高项目组研执行能力； 6.具备责任意识与服务意识，并具备良好的团队合作精神，能够在压力下出色地完成工作。 任职要求： 1.三年及以上市场研究与咨询相关经验，具有快消品消费者研究丰富经验，一年以上团队管理经验， 2.熟练使用研究咨询的各种工具、方法，能够独立完成定量研究，具有优秀的报告撰写能力； 3.良好的沟通协调能力，能够解决执行过程中遇到的问题，完成与客户的谈判及不同部门间的协调工作； 4.具备责任意识与服务意识，并具备良好的团队合作精神，能够在压力下出色地完成工作； 5.能把英语作为工作语言的优先考虑。

title: Risk Manager (Model Risk)
description:
About Revolut People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, more freedom. And since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. With an arsenal of awesome products that span spending, saving, travel, transfers, investing, exchanging and more, our super app has helped 18 million customers get more from their money. And we're not done yet.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth, we believe that two things are essential to continuing our success: our people and our culture. So far, we have 3000 people working around the world, from our great offices or remotely, on our mission. And we're looking for more. We want brilliant people that love building great products, love redefining success, and love turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About the role Our Risk team sits at the very core of Revolut. Those special agents work across functions, products, and regions to monitor front-line performance and ensure that the business is on safe footing ️ People in the Risk team are among the first in the company to get involved in new business initiatives, from App Technology, through Treasury and Finance, to Customer Support

We're looking for a Risk Manager to manage Revolut's model risk A great data and analytics lover with strong emphasis on ML/AI applications to computer vision, AML/ATF, and fraud detection. Someone who'll dare to challenge our modelling processes and take them to the next level ‍♂️

Up for jumping on board? Let's get in touch

What you'll be doing
  • Providing senior management and the Board Risk & Compliance Committee with periodic key insight on material models
  • Keeping the incidence of adverse outcomes caused by the use of material models within our model risk appetite
  • Embedding strong model risk management practices end-to-end across the model lifecycle
  • Effectively challenging current modelling processes and methodologies
  • Validating and assigning reliable model risk ratings to material models each quarter in line with published goals
  • Increasing understanding of model assumptions, limitations, output, and overlays
What you'll need
  • Ability to work autonomously with the confidence to engage individuals at all levels
  • Evidence of having validated and/or developed many of the following model types (exceptionally strong candidates typically evidence 8 or more types):
  • Valuation & Pricing Models / Risk Models: Market Risk Models, Counterparty Credit Risk Models, Operational Risk Models, Liquidity Risk Models / Credit Risk Scoring Models / IFRS9/CECL/ALLL Models / Stress Testing Models (CCAR/DFAST, PRA, BoE ACS, EBA) / Finance & Treasury Models / Fincrime Models (BSA/ATA, Fraud, KYC) / Collaborative Filtering Models
  • Natural Language Processing-based Models / Computer Vision Models / Insurance Models, Disaster Modelling / Weather Derivatives Modelling / Marketing & Growth Models / Conduct & Compliance Risk Models
  • Evidence of competence in the following techniques (the more the better):
  • Supervised Learning, Prediction (OLS, Nearest Neighbour), Statistical Decision Theory, Local Methods in High Dimensions, Structured Regression Models / Classification Methods, Discriminant Analysis, Logistic Regression, Support Vector Machines, Decision Trees, Text Categorisation, Fraud Detection, OCR, Machine Vision, Natural Language Processing, Market Segmentation / Regularisation, Kernel Smoothing, Model Assessment and Selection, Boosting / Neural Nets as they relate to Computer Vision
  • Unsupervised Learning, Vector Quantisation, Generative Topographic Map / Econometric Analysis of Time Series & Panel Data Models with > 3 Statistical Tests / Stochastic Modelling, Monte Carlo Methods / Optimization Algorithms, Portfolio Optimization / > 10 Statistical Tests including Combinations Of Parametric & Nonparametric, Comprehensive Tests for Assessing Recall, Precision, Accuracy / Numerical Methods For PDEs
  • Evidence of working knowledge in Python (tensorflow, keras, sklearn) and SQL languages
  • Knowledge of legislation and regulations relating to model risk management in the UK, USA, and EU: IFRS9/CECL/ALLL, ICAAP/ILAAP, SR 11-7, TRIM, BASEL, SS 318, SS 518, BSA/AML, OFAC, Basel 239
  • Ability to work under pressure
Nice to have
  • Evidence of working knowledge of C/C / Docker languages
Compensation range
  • Lithuania: €4,100 - €5,000 gross monthly*
  • Other locations: Compensation will be discussed during the interview process
*Final compensation will be determined based on the candidate's qualifications, skills, and previous experience

By applying for the above position, you will confirm that you have reviewed and agreed to our Data Privacy Notice for Candidates .

title: 电控工程师
description:
该职位来源于猎聘 岗位描述: 1、负责医疗机器人电控系统设计工作，参与机器人电子电路的评估与设计。 2、负责机器人电控系统设计与各元器件选型工作。 3、负责协同结构设计师完成机器人控制柜、管线布局设计。 4、负责机器人系统电控相关的说明书的编制和完善工作。

岗位要求： 1、本科及以上学历，自动化 、电气工程及其自动化、机电一体化相关专业，有从事机器人自动化行业优先； 2、熟练使用EDA电子电路设计软件，熟悉单片机开发，掌握嵌入式开发相关内容，具有一定的C、C++的编程能力；3、具备一定CAD制图能力，熟悉常用电气元器件及传感器的特点及选型，了解常用PLC，具有现场常见故障排除能力；4、熟悉电机系统相关测试标准与测试设备，示波器、编码器、力矩传感器等设备，熟悉GB/T16439、GB/T17626等电子器件电磁兼容等标准； 5、动手能力强，良好的沟通能力，有较强的团队协作意识及责任心，具有创新思维。

title: Overnight Shift Engineer
description:
About Us

What's your passion? Whether you're into tennis, swimming or karaoke, at IHG we're interested in YOU. At IHG we employ people who apply the same amount of care and passion to their jobs as they do their hobbies - people who put our guests at the heart of everything they do. And we're looking for more people like this to join our friendly and professional team.

HOTEL OVERVIEW:

For 70 years, the InterContinental® Brand has been writing the story of international travel and showing guests the InterContinental Life through personalized service, memorable, one of a kind experiences and global etiquette. As part of the largest luxury hotel brand in the world, InterContinental® Boston is a landmark of luxury; rated in the top five on Trip Advisor for Boston hotels, named one of the ‘Best Hotels in the World' by Condé Nast Traveler magazine and featuring a Forbes Four-Star, 4 Diamond AAA rated hotel experience. The property overlooks Boston's historic waterfront, featuring 424 luxurious ultra-modern accommodations with distinctive style and breathtaking waterfront or downtown city views, a full service spa and fitness club, 32,000 square feet of premier meeting and event space, and an array of restaurants and bars influenced by a variety of international flavors. We are looking for passionate people who are charming, confident and internationally-minded to ensure we continue the story of making great things happen at InterContinental® Boston.

Your day to day

This challenging position has overall responsibility for performing major repairs and maintenance work to ensure hotel maintenance quality and safety standards are achieved and maintained.

DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:

As a Repair & Maintenance Engineer you will:
  • Perform maintenance and repairs for assigned area of expertise
  • Ensure that assigned equipment is prepared and operational for the following day's work and adhere to federal, state and local regulations concerning safety and other compliance requirements, as well as brand standards and local policy and procedures to ensure quality, safety, and consistency
  • Handle guest calls for maintenance needs with the utmost professionalism and courtesy
  • Report all unsafe conditions or malfunctioning equipment to supervisor
  • May educate and train hotel staff in the safe and proper use of equipment
  • Follow procedures that ensure the security of inventory and assets such as tools, supplies, equipment, furniture, televisions etc.
  • Replenish supplies and inventory in a timely and efficient manner, and minimize waste
  • Assist with other duties as assigned.

What we need from you

Advanced vocational training plus two years of experience in general building maintenance and/or construction, or an equivalent combination of education and experience.

Professional certification and license is necessary, if required by law. You may be required to work nights, weekends, and/or holidays. This job requires ability to perform the following: Carrying, lifting pushing and/or pulling items weighing up to 100-300 pounds, frequently standing up and moving about the facility, frequently handling objects and equipment to maintain the facility, and frequently bending, stooping, kneeling, climbing and crawling.

What we offer

In return we'll give you a competitive financial and benefits package which may include healthcare support, dental, vision, disability and life insurance support, and a matching 401k plan. Hotel discounts worldwide are available as well as access to a wide variety of discount programs and the chance to work with a great team of people. Most importantly, we'll give you the room to be yourself.

IHG is an equal opportunity employer: Minorities / Females / Disabled / Veterans.

WE ARE NATIONALLY RANKED

程能力，熟悉Python，C++编程语言；

  • 参与边缘深度学习算法部署和优化，进行核心算法工程化和优化。

  • 参与搭建公司自研的深度学习模型训练与推理框架

6、模型、算法和平台的搭建

7、项目业务支持：作为技术人员，必要时为商务人员或交付人员提供支持。

title: Registered Nurse
description:
How You'll Apply For This Job

We're updating the design of NHS Jobs and the way you apply.

This means you'll apply for this job through a new updated version of the website.

If you've already got an NHS Jobs account

You'll need to create a new NHS Jobs account and apply for this job through the new version.

You'll still have access to your current NHS Jobs account. For example, you can sign in and view your profile, your applications, and you can copy and paste any information from there into your new account, if you need to.

You'll have these 2 accounts while there's a 'current' and 'new' version of the website. Your new account will replace your current account when the website design is fully updated.

If you've not got an NHS Jobs account

You'll need to continue and create one to apply for this job.

If you want to access the website in Welsh

The new NHS Jobs website is also available in Welsh. Choose the Welsh (Cymraeg) option on the new NHS Jobs website to change the language from English to Welsh.

title: Sr Engineer - RF Test Engineer (onsite)
description:
Job Description

Exciting opportunity for an Electrical Engineer to work in the Hardware Electronic Center of Raytheon's RI&S division, at our facility in North Dallas, Texas. The candidate will have responsibility for the verification of RF products including (Transmit-Receive Integrated Modules) while supporting product manufacturing and test. The candidate will become a member of an integrated product team, inclusive of design, process, and test. Responsibilities include formulating test verification methods and systems, supporting resolution of manufacturing and test issues and encouraging continuous improvement projects. Additionally, the position requires (1) monitoring of manufacturing and test data on a daily basis to identify defect trends and working with process and manufacturing engineering to resolve any issues identified, (2) implementing needed electrical design changes, verifying performance of modified circuits, and updating corresponding electrical requirements and specifications. (3) Formulating next generation test strategies and methods to improve test times and test performance in general.

The position provides growth opportunities, including customer and supplier interaction and the opportunity to transition to future module design or systems roles.

Required Skills
  • Demonstrated experience in RF test methods, systems, and equipment with experience in the application of statistics to data to formulate decisions on behalf of the team
  • Experience in the authoring of requirements and verification documentation, inclusive of test plans and procedures
  • Experience production test of RF/Microwave modules
  • Experience with simulation instrument such ADS, HFSS or equivalent
  • PNA general-purpose network analyzer experience

Desired Skills
  • Demonstrated communication skills

Required Education

BSEE in Electrical Engineering

Desired Education

MSEE in Electrical Engineering

This position requires either a U.S. Person or a Non-U.S. Person who is eligible to obtain any required Export Authorization.

U.S. Citizenship status is required as this position needs ability to obtain U.S. Secret Security Clearance

Location: Dallas TX

Relocation Eligible

Employee Referral Award Eligibility: Only employees currently within RMD and RI&S have the potential to receive a Referral Award for submitting a referral to RMD and RI&S roles. ALL eligibility requirements must be met to receive the Referral Awarding.

Raytheon Technologies is An Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status, age or any other federally protected class.

title: Senior Java Developer
description:
Are you a tech professional looking for remote work in a global setting? If yes, this job is for you.

Welcome to EPAM Anywhere - a global job platform offering remote work opportunities in the technology sector. Join us to build a career around your lifestyle working on modern projects for global brands and exciting startups.

Currently, we are looking for a remote Senior Java Developer to join our global team.

The customer is the world's leading oilfield services company providing cutting-edge solutions for reservoir characterization, drilling, production & processing.

Responsibilities
  • Maintenance - debugging, bug fixing, fixing technical debt and security vulnerabilities, etc. Due to the large number of services and libraries owned by the team, most of our capacity goes into maintaining them. Each sprint a different person is chosen as a dedicated SRE and responsible for observing PROD issues and fixing them
  • Resolving technical challenges and blockers. Making design decisions (mostly code and sometimes architectural). The team works mostly on technical user stories and rarely on business functionality. Close communication with architect, team lead and DevOps Team
  • DevOps - implementing CI/CD and fixing CI/CD related issues, setting up and configuring logging, monitoring, alerting tools
  • Testing - unit testing (JUnit, Mockito, etc.) and integration testing (Cucumber, WireMock, etc.)
  • Implementation of business functionality on rare occasions
  • Planning, estimation, doing WBS (work breakdown), etc

Requirements
  • 3+ years of experience in Java Development
  • Good Java + Spring Boot knowledge is a must
  • Good understanding of Microservices and inter-service communication mechanisms like Messaging (Kafka and Google PubSub) and REST
  • Familiarity with container or virtualisation technologies, e.g, K8S (AKS, GKE)
  • DevOps experience (besides K8s and Cloud)

Nice to have
  • Knowledge of Azure DevOps
  • Knowledge of Bash
  • Knowledge of Google Cloud Platform
  • Knowledge of Python

We offer
  • Paid time off
  • Paid sick leave days
  • Health insurance
  • Stable income
  • 100% remote work forever
  • Stable workload
  • Free licensed software
  • Possibility to work on your own device (BYOD)
  • Relocation opportunities
  • Flexible engagement models
  • Free trainings for technical and soft skills
  • Free access to LinkedIn Learning platform
  • Skyeng language courses
  • Free access to internal and external e-Libraries
  • Certification opportunities
  • Skill advisory service

This is a remote position and we welcome applications from anywhere in Kazakhstan

Once you apply, you'll receive a confirmation email with a link to EPAM Anywhere platform. Sign up with this link to automate your prescreening, be able to monitor your application statuses, and enjoy a faster job application process.

Please note that even though you are applying for this position, you may be offered other projects to join within EPAM Anywhere.

EPAM Anywhere is a part of EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM). Since 1993, EPAM has leveraged its advanced software engineering heritage to become the foremost global digital transformation services provider.

  • Paid Training, Paid Vacation, Paid Holidays, Paid weekly
  • Incentive Opportunities
  • Uniforms Provided
  • We love to celebrate seasonal traditions and employee milestones
COVID-19 Considerations
  • We provide Covid-19- specific training as well as PPE ( personal protective equipment ) as part of the uniform
  • We practice social distancing in our office and with our customers
Apply Now!

Text / Call us at 239-572-1177

3570

Compensation: $15.00 - $17.00 per hour

When you put on a Molly Maid® uniform, you become part of a family—a team of people committed to excellent customer service and passionate about giving families the joy of a cleaned home and the relief from needing to do it themselves. Working for our franchise owners means they’ll take care of you the way they take care of their own family and friends. Because Molly Maid is not just a company that focuses on expertly cleaning homes, it’s a company that focuses on people, and creating a work culture of respect, integrity, and fun is just as important as serving our customers.
  • All independently owned and operated franchised businesses operate under the service brands’ marks, trademarks, trade names, logos, emblems, slogans, or other indicia of origin in connection with the Molly Maid® franchise system within a specified geographical area. Only the independently owned and operated franchised business shall have any interaction with or authority for its business and make all employment related decisions related to its franchised business.

title: Patient Care Associate (Part Time Day, Barnabas Unit)
description:
Req #: 0000063177

Category: Nurses Aide

Status: Part-Time

Shift: Day

Facility: Central Jersey Behavioral Health

Location:

Adult Psych (Ap), 1691 U.S. Highway 9, Toms River, NJ 08755

The Patient Care Associate (PCA) is a member of the multidisciplinary treatment team and works under the direct supervision of a psychiatric RN or designee to provide care to patients with diverse emotional illness. Job responsibilities include but are not limited to assisting patients with ADL's, taking vital signs and providing one to one and group supervision of patients.

Qualifications
  • CNA certification preferred.
  • Previous experience as a nurse aide preferred.
  • High School Diploma or GED equivalent required within one (1) year of hire. Candidates who do not possess a High School Diploma or GED equivalent will be provided the opportunity to enroll in a GED/HSEA program at time of hire as a condition of employment. A hired candidate will be provided one (1) year from date of hire to successfully complete a GED program and obtain the HSEA.
  • Current BLS for Health Care Providers (CPR and AED) Program Certification, or able to obtain within 30 days of employment.
Additional Information

The Barnabas Health Behavioral Health Center (with Monmouth Medical Center Southern Campus Behavioral Health Services) constitutes a freestanding 100-bed acute care psychiatric facility which provides inpatient and intensive outpatient programs for adults and older adults diagnosed with psychiatric and dual disorders.

RWJBarnabas Health is committed to our communities and the members we serve. RWJBH understands that in order to create strong, healthy, and sustainable communities, we have to re-engineer and transform current systems. Providing educational support and resources contributes to our overall social impact mission and community investment efforts.

RWJBarnabas Health is an Equal Opportunity Employer

title: Case Management Program Clinical Coordinator
description:
The health and safety of our employees and of those individuals we serve is of utmost importance to us. MENTOR, a member of the Sevita family, is a community-based, behavioral health care organization offering a continuum of services including adult behavioral health, substance abuse counseling, children’s behavioral health, autism services, and early childhood services.

Program Services Clinical Coordinator

Everybody needs a job but only extraordinary people work here. Our team is creative and dedicated to making a difference every day in the lives of the people we serve.
  • Coordinate the development, review, and implementation of services, case management, behavior intervention plans, and treatments provided to individuals served.
  • Oversee all services provided to individuals and their families, monitor quality of care delivered, ensure compliance with contractual terms, and monitor regulatory program compliance.
  • Assist in the development of quality services and engaging activities that meet the individual served needs.
  • Build and maintain relationships with families and external case managers.
Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s degree in human services or related field.
  • One year of work-related experience working with individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities, brain injury, youth placed at-risk, etc. preferred.
  • An equivalent combination of education and experience.
  • Current driver's license, car registration, and auto insurance.
  • Licensure and training as required by state such as CPR, First Aid, Behavioral Intervention Techniques, etc.
  • QMRP/QIDDP as required by state.
  • A reliable, responsible attitude and a compassionate approach.
  • A commitment to quality in everything you do.
Why Join Us?
  • Full, Part-time, and As Needed schedules available.
  • Full compensation/benefits package for employees working 30+ hours/week.
  • 401(k) with company match.
  • Paid time off and holiday pay.
  • Rewarding work, impacting the lives of those you serve, working alongside a great team of coworkers.
  • Enjoy job security with nationwide career development and advancement opportunities.
We have meaningful work for you – come join our team – Apply Today!

Sevita is a leading provider of home and community-based specialized health care. We believe that everyone deserves to live a full, more independent life. We provide people with quality services and individualized supports that lead to growth and independence, regardless of the physical, intellectual, or behavioral challenges they face. We’ve made this our mission for more than 50 years. And today, our 40,000 team members continue to innovate and enhance care for the 50,000 individuals we serve. Equal Opportunity Employer, including disability/vets

title: Database Developer | Dordrecht
description:
Functie omschrijving

Weet jij als geen ander systemen aan elkaar te koppelen en heb jij goede kennis van SQL en UML?

Bij deze opdrachtgever in omgeving Dordrecht zien jouw taken er als volgt uit:
  • Je bent in deze rol voornamelijk verantwoordelijk voor het bouwen, implementeren en beheren van koppelingen tussen de bestaande systemen (zowel business 2 business als application 2 application).
  • Daarnaast inventariseer je de wensen van in- en externe klanten, die je vervolgens samen met je collega's, vertaalt naar technische specificaties, die jullie zelf ontwikkelen en implementeren.
  • Je bent werkzaam met de volgende technieken: EDI(XML, EDIFACT), SQL, Xslt, web services & JMS.
Bedrijfsprofiel

Jouw potentieel nieuwe werkgever is een multinationale organisatie, van origine een Nederlands familiebedrijf dat zich in de loop der jaren heeft gespecialiseerd op het gebied van transport, warehousing, distributie en supply chain oplossingen en opereert vanuit het hoofdkantoor.

Binnen dit bedrijf bestaat het IT team uit 12 IT'ers, de helft hiervan houdt zich bezig met de algehele IT infrastructuur, de andere helft bestaat uit applicatiebeheerders en twee andere back-end developers; jouw directe collega's en deskundige sparringpartners.

Met ruim 10 vestigingen verspreid over meerdere Europese landen telt deze werkgever ruim 600 medewerkers en ca. 400 werkplekken. Er is sprake van grote diversiteit aan werkzaamheden, culturele achtergronden, opleidingsniveaus en specialismen.

Salarisindicatie

Wat voor arbeidsvoorwaarden kan je verwachten?
  • Een salaris van max € 4.000,- bruto obv 40 uur (uiteraard afhankelijk van jouw kennis & ervaring).
  • 25 vakantiedagen en 8,33% vakantiegeld.
  • Reiskostenvergoeding.
  • Flexibele werktijden.
  • De mogelijkheid om thuis te werken.
  • Prima secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden.
  • Goede pensioenregeling.
Functie eisen

Wij zoeken een gemotiveerde techneut, die zich graag verdiept in back-end ontwikkeling. De nadruk van de functie zit in het ontwikkelen, implementeren en beheren van 400+ koppelingen tussen diverse systemen. Klinkt dit interessant?

Voldoe je daarnaast aan onderstaand profiel? Reageer dan direct!
  • Je hebt HBO werk- en denkniveau op het gebied van ICT (verkregen door opleiding of werkervaring).
  • Deze vacature staat zowel open voor starters als voor ervaren kandidaten. Voor starters is een afgeronde HBO opleiding richting ICT een must!
  • Je hebt kennis van de volgende tools/technieken: Databases, SQL, XML, Xslt. Heb je hier geen ervaring mee, maar zou je, je graag in deze technieken willen verdiepen? Dan nodigen wij je ook van harte uit om te solliciteren.
Wij bezorgen jou de leukste IT-baan!

Kijk voor meer informatie op en

Jelling IT Professionals streeft naar gelijke kansen op de arbeidsmarkt voor iedereen. Wij selecteren niet op geslacht, leeftijd, afkomst, etc. en nodigen daarom iedereen die zich herkent in bovenstaand profiel van harte uit om te solliciteren.

title: Senior Data Quality Engineer
description:
Are you a tech professional looking for remote work in a global setting? If yes, this job is for you.

Welcome to EPAM Anywhere - a global job platform offering remote work opportunities in the technology sector. Join us to build a career around your lifestyle working on modern projects for global brands and exciting startups.

We are currently looking for a Senior Data Quality Engineer with AWS proficiency to join our team.

The customer provides a complete and optimized research solution comprised of e-journals, e-books, and research databases — all combined with the most powerful discovery service to support the information needs and maximize the research experience of its end-users.

As a Quality Engineer, you will have an opportunity to design and implement a QA strategy for data analytics and visualization product.

Responsibilities
  • Effectively communicate with the Product Owner, BAs and Data Engineers
  • Maintain QA environments, ensuring code synchronization with production
  • Create and execute test plans

Requirements
  • Good SQL knowledge
  • Experience with Business Intelligence configuration management tools/processes
  • Experience with Graphical User Interface testing
  • Proficient English (written and spoken) B2

Nice to have
  • Experience with Tableau testing tools
  • Experience with Kinesis test framework

We offer
  • Paid time off
  • Paid sick leave days
  • Medical insurance
  • Stable income
  • 100% remote work forever
  • Free licensed software
  • Possibility to work on your own device (BYOD)
  • Stable workload
  • Relocation opportunities
  • Flexible engagement models
  • Free trainings for technical and soft skills
  • Free access to LinkedIn Learning platform
  • Language courses
  • Free access to internal and external e-Libraries
  • Certification opportunities
  • Skill advisory service

This is a remote position and we welcome applications from anywhere in Georgia

Once you apply, you'll receive a confirmation email with a link to EPAM Anywhere platform. Sign up with this link to automate your prescreening, be able to monitor your application statuses, and enjoy a faster job application process.

Please note that even though you are applying for this position, you may be offered other projects to join within EPAM Anywhere.

EPAM Anywhere is a part of EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM). Since 1993, EPAM has leveraged its advanced software engineering heritage to become the foremost global digital transformation services provider.

title: Assistant Resuscitation Trainer
description:
How You'll Apply For This Job

We're updating the design of NHS Jobs and the way you apply.

This means you'll apply for this job through a new updated version of the website.

If you've already got an NHS Jobs account

You'll need to create a new NHS Jobs account and apply for this job through the new version.

You'll still have access to your current NHS Jobs account. For example, you can sign in and view your profile, your applications, and you can copy and paste any information from there into your new account, if you need to.

You'll have these 2 accounts while there's a 'current' and 'new' version of the website. Your new account will replace your current account when the website design is fully updated.

If you've not got an NHS Jobs account

You'll need to continue and create one to apply for this job.

If you want to access the website in Welsh

The new NHS Jobs website is also available in Welsh. Choose the Welsh (Cymraeg) option on the new NHS Jobs website to change the language from English to Welsh.

title: 理容師【学歴不問】
company_name: アートネイチャー 名古屋店
description:
愛知県名古屋市中村区で理容師を募集中！ 【名古屋市中村区名駅】完全週休2日制！上場企業で理容師として安定した働き方 募集職種: 理容師 仕事内容: （1）オーダーメイドウィッグを利用しているお客様へのカットやカラーリング、ウィッグのメンテナンスなどのスタイリング業務 ・完全予約制、個室での接客 ・担当制で月70～80名程度（1日3～5名）のお客様対応 ・ニーズに応じてウィッグでのスタイル提案もします （2）PCの入力業務 ・お客様情報などのデータ入力、閉店後の締め作業 資格: 理容師免許 スタイリスト経験者 ブランク可 勤務時間: 9:40～18:40（実働8時間） 休憩時間60分 ※残業時間は月12時間程度 休日・休暇: 完全週休2日シフト制 ※シフト制なので土日でお休みを取ることもできます ★完全週休2日制に加えて、年末年始休暇など、各種休暇がある為、充実したプライベートとの両立ができます★ 福利厚生: 社会保険完備 財形貯蓄制度 各種祝い金（結婚・出産など） レクリエーション補助金（半期に1回、1人3000円まで） ハートカフェ補助金（四半期に1回、1人500円のランチミーティング代の補助） 同好会補助金 社員持株会 退職金制度 確定拠出年金 定期健康診断 制服貸与 豊富なキャリアプラン（店長やブロック長、本社各部署など。女性管理職登用実績あり） 入社後の研修あり アピールポイント: #アートネイチャー 名古屋店では、正職員の理容師を募集中！ -常連のお客様が中心で、基本的に担当制のためお客様一人ひとりに寄り添ってサポートできるやりがいのあるお仕事です。 -カットやカラーリングだけでなく、髪に関するカウンセリングやウィッグのメンテナンス、各種サービスのご提案も行います。入社後の研修体制が整っているので、ウィッグの取扱いが初めての方もご安心ください。 -完全週休2日制に加えて、年末年始休暇、特別休暇などの各種休暇が制度化されています。1時間単位での休暇取得も可能なため、充実したプライベートとの両立ができます。 #現役の方も、ブランクがある方も、安心して当社にお越しください。♪ -入社後は、弊社アカデミーが行う技術研修に参加！店舗でも教育担当が付き、研修カリキュラムに沿って練習します。いずれも営業時間内に行うため、無理なく着実に技術を身に付けられる環境です。 -入社後1年間は、安心して働けるように、人事部による定期なフォローを行っています。技術習得や人間関係の悩みなど、店舗で相談しにくい事があれば、解決に向けサポートしていきます。 株式会社アートネイチャーの詳しい情報はこちらのインタビューから！ https://job-medley.com/tips/detail/12709/ 特徴: 歩合制あり / ブランク可 / 駅近(5分以内) / 社会保険完備 / 車通勤可 / 週休2日 / 育児支援あり / ボーナス・賞与あり / 交通費支給 / 退職金あり / 復職支援 / 住宅手当 / 研修制度あり / 制服貸与 / 長期休暇あり / 学歴不問 / 40代活躍 / 大手サロン / スタイリスト 給与の備考: 月給23万円～26万円＋インセンティブ・賞与年2回・昇給年1回 ※上記に調整手当1万円（ただし、入社後12か月間に限り支給）を含む。

インセンティブの支給の有無・金額にかかわらず一律1万円を支給します。 ※経験や能力、配属地域等により決定。実績、人事評価等に応じて年次昇給します。 試用期間6ヵ月有り。同条件 勤続支援金: 正職員:5,500〜7,500円 【施設情報】 施設名: アートネイチャー 名古屋店 勤務地: 愛知県名古屋市中村区名駅4-10-25 名駅IMAIビル 10F 名鉄名古屋本線 名鉄名古屋駅から徒歩で5分 名鉄犬山線 名鉄名古屋駅から徒歩で5分 名鉄常滑線 名鉄名古屋駅から徒歩で5分 この施設で働く職員の声:
  • 美容師／経験年数3年の職員 Q. 今の仕事のやりがいは何ですか？ A. 髪に対して悩みを持ったお客様が多いので、ニーズに応えて希望のヘアスタイルにすることが出来た際には、その分感謝も多くいただけることがやりがいです。1～2時間の施術でお客様の見た目も大きく変わるので、その変化に対して期待以上とのお言葉をいただけることも多いです。 Q. 子育てしやすい環境・取り組みがあれば教えてください A. 前職のサロンでは、残業が当たり前になっており、休日出勤も多くありましたが、プライベートな時間も確保できるようになりました。現在、子育て中なのですが、産休・育休の制度が整っていて、残業も少なめなので、育児との両立が出来ていることは助かっています。 Q. どのようなスキルが身につく職場ですか？ A. 今まで培ってきた美容技術の提供だけでなく、ウィッグや増毛、育毛の技術も身に付けることが出来、その提供により、更にお客様に喜んでいただけるようになったことは、仕事においての魅力的なポイントかと思います。
  • 美容師（主任）／経験年数6年の職員 Q. 入職したきっかけを教えてください A. 前職のサロンでは11年勤務していましたが、自分の技術の幅を広げたいと思っていました。また自分の祖母も髪に対して悩みを持っていたことから、元々興味があり、入社を決意しました。とはいえ、ウィッグ業界は未経験なので、不安もありました。実際は、入社後の研修制度がしっかり用意されていて、業務を行う中でも必要なスキルが身に付けられる環境だったので、安心してお客様と向き合うことができました。 Q. 今の仕事のやりがいは何ですか？ A. 基本的には、お客様の悩みに応える仕事なので、日々やりがいは感じています。過去に病気が原因で、悩んでいたお客様にウィッグを使った技術を提供したときに、「これで、これから頑張っていけそう」とお言葉をいただいた時にはとくに嬉しかったですね。お客様と長いお付き合いをしていく顧客担当制なので、徐々に打ち解けて、関係を築き、色々な相談をしてもらえるようになったときにも、やりがいを実感しますね。 Q. 会社の魅力について教えてください A. 「子供との時間が取れるようになったこと」「定年まで働ける環境があること」「上場企業の一員となるので、社会的な地位が得られること」・・・。挙げれば他にもあると思いますが、やりがいはもちろん、福利厚生などの制度が整っていることも魅力的な点だと思います。これからも長く勤めていこうと思っているので、今は店長昇格に向けて、頑張っています。 【選考プロセス】 [1] ジョブメドレーの応募フォームよりご応募ください ↓ [2] 採用担当より面接日程の調整などの連絡をさせていただきます ↓ [3] 面接実施 ↓ [4] 採用決定のご連絡 ↓ [5] 入職手続きを進めつつ、ジョブメドレーから勤続支援金をご申請ください ※応募から内定までは平均1週間～1ヶ月ほどになります。 ※在職中で今すぐ転職が難しい方も調整のご相談が可能です。 豊富なキャリアプラン（店長やブロック長、本社各部署など。女性管理職登用実績あり） 入社後の研修あり アピールポイント: #アートネイチャー 名古屋店では、正職員の理容師を募集中！ -常連のお客様が中心で、基本的に担当制のためお客様一人ひとりに寄り添ってサポートできるやりがいのあるお仕事です。 -カットやカラーリングだけでなく、髪に関するカウンセリングやウィッグのメンテナンス、各種サービスのご提案も行います。入社後の研修体制が整っているので、ウィッグの取扱いが初めての方もご安心ください。 -完全週休2日制に加えて、年末年始休暇、特別休暇などの各種休暇が制度化されています。1時間単位での休暇取得も可能なため、充実したプライベートとの両立ができます。 #現役の方も、ブランクがある方も、安心して当社にお越しください。♪ -入社後は、弊社アカデミーが行う技術研修に参加！店舗でも教育担当が付き、研修カリキュラムに沿って練習します。いずれも営業時間内に行うため、無理なく着実に技術を身に付けられる環境です。 -入社後1年間は、安心して働けるように、人事部による定期なフォローを行っています。技術習得や人間関係の悩みなど、店舗で相談しにくい事があれば、解決に向けサポートしていきます。 株式会社アートネイチャーの詳しい情報はこちらのインタビューから！ https://job-medley.com/tips/detail/12709/ 特徴: 歩合制あり / ブランク可 / 駅近(5分以内) / 社会保険完備 / 車通勤可 / 週休2日 / 育児支援あり / ボーナス・賞与あり / 交通費支給 / 退職金あり / 復職支援 / 住宅手当 / 研修制度あり / 制服貸与 / 長期休暇あり / 学歴不問 / 40代活躍 / 大手サロン / スタイリスト 給与の備考: 月給23万円～26万円＋インセンティブ・賞与年2回・昇給年1回 ※上記に調整手当1万円（ただし、入社後12か月間に限り支給）を含む。
インセンティブの支給の有無・金額にかかわらず一律1万円を支給します。 ※経験や能力、配属地域等により決定。実績、人事評価等に応じて年次昇給します。 試用期間6ヵ月有り。同条件 勤続支援金: 正職員:5,500〜7,500円 【施設情報】 施設名: アートネイチャー 名古屋店 勤務地: 愛知県名古屋市中村区名駅4-10-25 名駅IMAIビル 10F 名鉄名古屋本線 名鉄名古屋駅から徒歩で5分 名鉄犬山線 名鉄名古屋駅から徒歩で5分 名鉄常滑線 名鉄名古屋駅から徒歩で5分 この施設で働く職員の声:
  • 美容師／経験年数3年の職員 Q. 今の仕事のやりがいは何ですか？ A. 髪に対して悩みを持ったお客様が多いので、ニーズに応えて希望のヘアスタイルにすることが出来た際には、その分感謝も多くいただけることがやりがいです。1～2時間の施術でお客様の見た目も大きく変わるので、その変化に対して期待以上とのお言葉をいただけることも多いです。 Q. 子育てしやすい環境・取り組みがあれば教えてください A. 前職のサロンでは、残業が当たり前になっており、休日出勤も多くありましたが、プライベートな時間も確保できるようになりました。現在、子育て中なのですが、産休・育休の制度が整っていて、残業も少なめなので、育児との両立が出来ていることは助かっています。 Q. どのようなスキルが身につく職場ですか？ A. 今まで培ってきた美容技術の提供だけでなく、ウィッグや増毛、育毛の技術も身に付けることが出来、その提供により、更にお客様に喜んでいただけるようになったことは、仕事においての魅力的なポイントかと思います。
  • 美容師（主任）／経験年数6年の職員 Q. 入職したきっかけを教えてください A. 前職のサロンでは11年勤務していましたが、自分の技術の幅を広げたいと思っていました。また自分の祖母も髪に対して悩みを持っていたことから、元々興味があり、入社を決意しました。とはいえ、ウィッグ業界は未経験なので、不安もありました。実際は、入社後の研修制度がしっかり用意されていて、業務を行う中でも必要なスキルが身に付けられる環境だったので、安心してお客様と向き合うことができました。 Q. 今の仕事のやりがいは何ですか？ A. 基本的には、お客様の悩みに応える仕事なので、日々やりがいは感じています。過去に病気が原因で、悩んでいたお客様にウィッグを使った技術を提供したときに、「これで、これから頑張っていけそう」とお言葉をいただいた時にはとくに嬉しかったですね。お客様と長いお付き合いをしていく顧客担当制なので、徐々に打ち解けて、関係を築き、色々な相談をしてもらえるようになったときにも、やりがいを実感しますね。 Q. 会社の魅力について教えてください A. 「子供との時間が取れるようになったこと」「定年まで働ける環境があること」「上場企業の一員となるので、社会的な地位が得られること」・・・。挙げれば他にもあると思いますが、やりがいはもちろん、福利厚生などの制度が整っていることも魅力的な点だと思います。これからも長く勤めていこうと思っているので、今は店長昇格に向けて、頑張っています。 【選考プロセス】 [1] ジョブメドレーの応募フォームよりご応募ください ↓ [2] 採用担当より面接日程の調整などの連絡をさせていただきます ↓ [3] 面接実施 ↓ [4] 採用決定のご連絡 ↓ [5] 入職手続きを進めつつ、ジョブメドレーから勤続支援金をご申請ください ※応募から内定までは平均1週間～1ヶ月ほどになります。 ※在職中で今すぐ転職が難しい方も調整のご相談が可能です。

title: Visiting Professor
description:
This is a Remote Position:


Positions are open at five distinct ranks: Postdoctoral Fellow,Assistant Professor, Associate Professor, Full Professor, and Chair Professor.


‍

Responsibilities and Duties

Applicants will have extensive teaching experience, have published high quality papers in their area of expertise, have been successful in obtaining research grants, and have substantial experience in the supervision of research students. The successful candidate, in addition to teaching typically two modules/courses per year (i.e. one per semester), will provide leadership in curriculum development and enhancing our research profile at the international level. They are expected to assume administrative responsibilities based on their experience.


Personal Attributes

  • Self-motivated and being able to motivate others;
  • Strong leadership and interpersonal skills;
  • Strong team player;
  • Proactive and flexible but with good respect for deadlines;
  • Able to work in an environment where diversity and inclusiveness is appreciated.


Essential Qualifications/Experiences

  • A PhD in a closely aligned area and PG Cert HE or equivalent;
  • Ideally few years of teaching/research experience at a university or equivalent after completion of PhD degree;
  • PhD supervision capacity;
  • Strong publications record in an area of expertise;
  • Evidence of success in obtaining research grants;
  • Fluency in English.


Desirable Qualifications and Experience

Professional memberships such as BCS, IET, ACM, IEE and HEA;

Strong knowledge / experience in international higher education.


Compensation Package

Range of Annual Base Pay:

Lecturer: 280k-320k RMB

Assistant Professor: 360k-400k RMB

Associate Professor: 450k-490k RMB

Senior Associate Professor: 540k-580k RMB

Professor: Above 620k RMB, negotiable

Members of Academic Staff are entitled to subsidies for accommodation, travel, and children’s educational, medical insurance, and a one-time relocation allowance is provided. Overseas staff may receive a tax “holiday”, depending on nationality and personal circumstances.

title: Revenue Cycle Supervisor
description:
*Description:*

The Revenue Cycle Supervisor is responsible for the supervision of the revenue cycle process. This person works closely with the Director of Revenue Cycle Management in overseeing operational processes, personnel, and administrative functions to maximize cash flow while maintaining and improving internal and external customer relations. Essential Duties:
  • Experience working in all areas of the Revenue Cycle process (charge capture/coding/billing/AR/payment posting)
  • Partners with the Director RCM to ensure appropriate staffing levels and balance of workload for the team and participates in the hiring process
  • Supports a positive workplace culture to attract and retain revenue cycle talent
  • Serves as a resource of knowledge and guidance for the team
  • Responsible for consistent and ongoing training
  • Performs period reviews to coach and provide constructive feedback to improve performance and maintain employment engagement
  • Reviews time management and organizational skills in the team to ensure they accomplish their productivity goals
  • Partners with Director to analyze and address staff performance and conduct in a timely and professional manner, offering counseling, corrective action and termination as necessary
  • Drives standardization of processes including proper documentation, distribution, and communication
  • Responsible for clear, detailed communication with all internal and external customers
  • Communicates payer issues/trends to Director in a timely manner
  • Partners with the General Ledger Team to ensure a timely month end close process
  • Develop, implement and maintain controls and procedures to ensure accurate accounts receivable balances and timely collection of payments
  • Review trends in increased AR days, decreased cash collections, various other financial measures to determine process inefficiencies and present corrective action plans to Director in a timely manner
  • Understands and complies with applicable laws regarding billing, collections, and refund processing
  • Maintain familiarity with HIPPA requirements.
  • Assist with credentialing and paneling as needed
  • Complete related tasks as required
  • Skills:*

Supervisory skills, Revenue cycle management, Revenue cycle, Medical billing, Accounts receivable, Health care, Insurance, Management skills, inpatient coding, inpatient billing, psychiatric billing, Hospital billing
  • Top Skills Details:*

Supervisory skills,Revenue cycle management
  • Additional Skills & Qualifications:*
  • Minimum 3 years RCM experience
  • Minimum 1 year Supervisory/Management experience
  • Experience with psychiatric inpatient billing
  • Inpatient coding experience
  • Requires Intermediate computer skills in typing/keyboarding, Microsoft Word and Excel programs as well as Outlook email.
  • Experience Level:*

Intermediate Level

Established in 1997, Aston Carter is a leading staffing and consulting firm, providing high-caliber talent and premium services to more than 7,000 companies across North America. Spanning four continents and more than 200 offices, we extend our clients’ capabilities by seeking solvers and delivering solutions to address today’s workforce challenges. For organizations looking for innovative solutions shaped by critical-thinking professionals, visit [AstonCarter.com.](AstonCarter.com) Aston Carter is a company within Allegis Group, a global leader in talent solutions. The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law. If you would like to request a reasonable accommodation, such as the modification or adjustment of the job application process or interviewing process due to a disability, please call 888-237-6835 or email [astoncarteraccommodation@astoncarter.com](mailto:%20astoncarteraccommodation@astoncarter.com) for other accommodation options. title: Sales Associate (part-time)
description:
This position reports to the Museum Store Manager and is responsible for all aspects of customer service in the Museum stores. Duties include greeting and assisting customers, accurately processing transactions, receiving & stocking shelves; and maintaining an attractive store appearance. The ideal candidate will have Retail Experience, good communication skills, basic merchandising skills, and basic math skills and a passion for working in Retail. The ability to work on weekends and holidays is required.

The National WWII Museum offers a competitive wage and benefits package which includes the following:
  • Competitive wages
  • Flexible spending account
  • 401(k) – Museum matches 50% of employee contribution up to 6%; employer contribution fully vested after 3 years of employment
  • Paid vacation and sick leave, 10 paid holidays per year
  • Free parking
  • Employee assistance program

title: Obelisk - Artist Relations Lead
description:
Who we are

OBELISK is an innovative, ambitious DAO in the BitDAO ecosystem that aims to revolutionize the nature of public art.

The project was founded by shl0ms, a pseudonymous conceptual digital artist with a cult following.

Due to the stealth nature of the project, the model has not yet been made public. We will clarify the goals and structure of the project during our introductory conversations.

What You'll Help Us Build
  • Develop, formalize, and execute artist outreach strategy.
  • Provide recommendations and connections to potential artists & jurors.
  • Create and manage partnerships with peer organizations, museums, and institutions.
  • Coordinate securing an art-world specific PR firm, if not already secured, and manage the relationship while defining success metrics (number of press pieces, media impressions, etc)
  • Cultivate, build, and maintain relationships with potential artists & jurors.
  • Review artist proposals, in partnership with Obelisk team, select artists to build with. Own all communication with both selected and not-selected artists on the status of their applications.
  • Advise during project proposal process & feasibility analysis, from artist application through to artwork completion.

Your craft
  • Intuitive understanding of the full lifecycle of public arts, from funding to location sourcing to installation
  • Intimate knowledge of the fine art world and deep connections with renowned artists

Extra credit
  • Strong understanding of the traditional art world as well as the potential for Web3 to transform the art world.

We’d love to hear from you if you have valuable experience to bring to the role/company. If you identify with the team and mission, but not all of our requirements, then please still apply.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责： 1、根据销售目标，执行公司销售计划，维护客户资源，建立良好的合作伙伴关系，确保销售任务的达成； 2、基于公司资源及产品优势，结合公司营销目标和业务发展目标积极分析和引导客户需求； 3、收集行业相关的市场销售信息，及时反馈客户业务需求和竞争对手信息，提出有效的市场运作及销售建议； 4、负责合同的沟通协商、制定所需的协议合同文本； 5、参加医疗行业各类相关的专业会议，了解行业动态和发展趋势； 6、组织开展公司产品推广/宣讲会，提高公司品牌和产品的认识度，收集市场信息； 7、提供市场分析报告，为销售部门和研发团队提供策略支持，从市场、产品和销售的角度提出有效的建议。 任职要求： 1、本科以上学历，从事销售、商务、公关工作5年以上； 2、有医院、财政、法院、交警行业经验优先； 3、有医院、医疗协会、信息协会沟通协调经验优先； 4、优秀的语言表达能力、沟通能力及技巧、协调和组织能力，能承受工作压力； 5、思路敏捷、善于捕捉客户需求和商机，有较强的沟通、公关及谈判能力，具备高度责任心； 6、Office办公技能良好，熟练使用Word，Excel，PPT。

title: 外贸销售专员（双休）
company_name: 广州蓝恩电子科技有限公司
description:

1、负责操作阿里巴巴、外贸快车平台，回复询盘、开发客户；

2、负责国外业务开拓，通过搜索引擎、linkedin、facebook、whatsapp、skype等社交平台自主开发海外客户，完成公司业绩要求；

3、负责处理询盘、报价、谈判、订单促成、订单确认、发货、售后等事宜；

4、负责跟进潜在客户和维护老客户客情，以促成再次下单。

任职要求：

1、专业不限，英语四级以上；喜欢跟国外客户沟通，不管是邮件、电话、skype还是whatapp等及时沟通；

3、英语基础扎实，能熟练用英文书面或口头沟通，较强的商业意识以及谈判技巧，开拓能力强；

4、具备较好的沟通，领悟及执行能力，工作踏实认真，勤奋好学，应对快捷敏锐，责任心强。

我们的优势：

title: Payments Financial Crimes Business Line Advisory Analyst - Charlotte, NC or Minneapolis, MN
description:
At U.S. Bank, we're passionate about helping customers and the communities where we live and work. The fifth-largest bank in the United States, we’re one of the country's most respected, innovative and successful financial institutions. U.S. Bank is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating a diverse workforce. We consider all qualified applicants without regard to race, religion, color, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status, among other factors.

Job Description

The Payment Services Financial Crimes Compliance (FCC) Chief Risk Office (CRO) team is seeking a Business Line Advisory Analyst responsible for managing financial crimes risk impacting Payments Services, specifically for Retail Payment Solutions (RPS).

Responsibilities Will Include
  • Providing support for the RPS consumer and business credit card segment, specific to Financial Crimes and AML risks.
  • Engage with key partners across Payments Chief Risk Office, Business Lines and Second Line of Defense Teams on key strategies and issues.
  • Provide advice and counsel in relation to financial crimes impacts for new strategies and products for our business lines.
  • Working closely with the Second Line of Defense teams (SLOD) to ensure Business processes are working effectively and there are adequate controls to mitigate financial crimes risk.
  • Provide effective, respectful challenge where appropriate and attempt to resolve or mitigate concerns raised by SLOD.
  • Ensuring compliance with enterprise policies.
  • Proactively assess risk in business process and work with business lines on developing and executing remediation plans.
Basic Qualifications
  • Bachelor's degree
  • Seven to ten years of applicable experience
Preferred Skills/Experience
  • 7 to 10 years of experience in a Business Control/Risk/Compliance/Audit function.
  • Familiarity with the Bank Secrecy Act, Patriot Act and AML policies and/or laws.
  • Experience with large complex banking organizations and their product/service offerings
  • Experience in providing guidance regarding complex operational and compliance matters, enforcing requirements, working with business partners, negotiating desired outcomes, executing project and implementation plans, and reporting issues and trends to management
  • Excellent presentation, interpersonal, written and verbal communication, presentation, relationship building and negotiation skills.
  • Strong understanding of issue management and the resolution process.
  • Advanced Microsoft Excel, Word and PowerPoint
  • CAMS designation or equivalent risk management certification
If there’s anything we can do to accommodate a disability during any portion of the application or hiring process, please refer to our disability accommodations for applicants.

Benefits

Take care of yourself and your family with U.S. Bank employee benefits. We know that healthy employees are happy employees, and we believe that work/life balance should be easy to achieve. That's why we share the cost of benefits and offer a variety of programs, resources and support you need to bring your full self to work and stay present and committed to the people who matter most - your family.

Learn all about U.S. Bank employee benefits, including tuition reimbursement, retirement plans and more, by visiting careers.usbank.com.

EEO is the Law

Applicants can learn more about the company’s status as an equal opportunity employer by viewing the federal EEO is the Law poster.

E-Verify

U.S. Bank participates in the U.S. Department of Homeland Security E-Verify program in all facilities located in the United States and certain U.S. territories. The E-Verify program is an Internet-based employment eligibility verification system operated by the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services. Learn more about the E-Verify program.

Due to legal requirements, U.S. Bank requires that the successful candidate hired for some positions be fully-vaccinated for COVID-19, absent being granted an accommodation due to a medical condition, pregnancy, or sincerely held religious belief or other legally required exemption. For these positions, as part of the conditional offer of employment, the successful candidate will be asked to provide proof of vaccination or approval for an accommodation or exemption upon hire.

We're hiring a Helicopter Pilot to provide medical air transportation services to our customers. Scheduled shifts run seven consecutive days on and off . Safety is a key pillar of our services

title: Registered Nurse (RN) - Home Health - PRN
description:
Division: Home Health

Are you in search of a new career opportunity that makes a meaningful impact? If so, now is the time to find your calling at Enhabit Home Health & Hospice.

As a national leader in home-based care, Enhabit is consistently ranked as one of the best places to work in the country. We’re committed to expanding what’s possible for patient care in the home, all while fostering a unique culture that is both innovative and collaborative.

At Enhabit, the best of what’s next starts with us. We not only make it a priority to maintain an ethical and stable workplace but also continually invest in our employees. By extending ongoing professional development opportunities and providing cutting-edge technology solutions, we ensure our employees are always moving their careers forward and prepared to deliver a better way to care for our patients.

Subject To Employee Eligibility, Some Benefits, Tools And Resources Include

Ever-mindful of the need for employees to care for themselves and their families, Enhabit offers competitive benefits that support and promote healthy lifestyle choices.
  • Generous time off with pay for full-time employees
  • Continuing education opportunities
  • Scholarship program for employees and their children
  • Matching 401(k) plan for all employees
  • Comprehensive insurance plans for medical, dental and vision coverage for full-time employees
  • Supplemental insurance policies for life, disability, critical illness, hospital indemnity and accident insurance plans for full-time employees
  • Flexible spending account plans for full-time employees
  • Minimum essential coverage health insurance plan for all employees
  • Electronic medical records and mobile devices for all clinicians
  • Incentivized bonus plan
Responsibilities

Our PRN Registered Nurse (RN) administers skilled care visits to clients requiring intermittent professional services and teaches the client, family, and other members of the health care team. These services are performed in accordance with the physician’s orders and the established plan of care, under the direction and supervision of the Branch Director.

Qualifications
  • Must hold a current and unencumbered Registered Nursing License in the state which you intend to work.
  • Must be organized, detail-oriented and possess effective communication skills both orally and in writing.
  • RN must understand the issues related to the delivery of home health care and be able to problem-solve effectively.
  • Ability to assume a flexible work schedule.
Requirements
  • Must have a current driver's license and automobile insurance.

title: Principal Specialist, Field Service
description:
Pratt & Whitney is working to, once again, transform the future of flight—designing, building and servicing engines unlike any the world has ever seen. And because transformation begins from within, we’re seeking the people to drive it. So, calling all curious.

In addition to transforming the future of flight, we are also transforming how and where we work. Pratt & Whitney is laser focused on offering flexibility to our employees. We’ve introduced role types (Onsite, Hybrid, or Remote) and now list them in the job posting title so candidates know where they will operate in our blended work environment.
  • Please consider the following role type definition as you apply for this role.

Onsite: Employees who are working in Onsite roles will work primarily onsite. This includes all production and maintenance workers, as they are essential to the development of our engines.

Come ready to explore and you’ll find a place where your talent takes flight—beyond the borders of title, a country or your comfort zone. Bring your passion and commitment and we’ll welcome you into a tight-knit team that takes our mission personally. Channel your drive to make a difference into shaping an organization and an industry that’s evolving fast to the future. Where the difference you make is on display every day. Just look up.

Are you ready to go beyond?

Primary Responsibilities

Field Service Representative (FSR) for F119 programs at Tinker Air Force Base, Oklahoma. The FSR is responsible in providing on-site contractor technical expertise as required to resolve issues affecting F119 Operations within the Heavy Maintenance Center. Specific responsibilities will include:
  • Provide on-site contractor technical expertise as required to resolve issues affecting F119
  • Operations within HMC in a timely manner.
  • Work with Customer Support Engineering (CSE), Global Support Engineering (GSE) and After
  • Market Services on hardware issue utilizing Merlin system, meetings and the collection/distribution of dimensional data, pictures, and defect description to resolve issue.
  • Address Integrated Electronic Technical Manual system (IETMs) Technical Order Data (TOD) issues by submitting changes via Merlin TOD change requests.
  • Work closely with all customers to resolve quality issues through ACE initiatives.
  • Access blueprints through DocAccess to support TOD changes and hardware disposition.
  • Track Merlin status by generating reports using RITS.
  • Prepare and brief F119 HMC modules status and hardware issue.
  • Initiate and track Deficiency Report (DR) in the Joint Deficiency Report System (JDRS).
  • Submit/track waivers for non-conforming hardware to customer for approval
  • Work with Compass Vector Committee (CV) with on-site Analytical Condition Inspection (ACI)
  • Program support.
  • Work with customer/PW engineering on all Safety Investigation Board (SIB) and Deficiency Records (DR) modules that requires additional inspection requirements.

Basic Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s Degree in related field or equivalent technical experience.
  • 5+ years of experience.
  • Ability to obtain and/or maintain a DoD security clearance.
  • US Citizenship is required due to government contracts.
  • Ability to work any shift, including weekends when required.
  • Commitment to the Environmental, Health and Safety (EH&S) program and compliance with all policies and procedures, completing all required training and supporting all EH&S committee activities.
  • Minimal travel may be required.

Preferred Qualifications
  • Must have excellent communication skills with internal and external customers.
  • Working knowledge of USAF Material Review Board (MRB)/ Non-Conforming Material Review (NCMR) process.
  • Basic understanding of Air Force Instruction 21-101 and 2J-1-111
  • Experience in configuration management, IETMS, Merlin’s, Deficiency Records, TCTOs, and evaluating blueprints.
  • Proficiency using Microsoft Office Suite is desired (i.e., Word, Excel, Power Point, and Access).
  • Able to work with minimal supervision on a wide variety of tasks.

Raytheon Technologies is An Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status, age or any other federally protected class.

title: Online Orderfilling and Delivery
description:
What You'll Do At

Do you enjoy shopping?

Online orderfillers and delivery associates get to do just that every day. Online orderfillers have the opportunity to shop for our customers and choose just the right apple, or select their favorite cereal. This position is extremely fast paced and is one that gets to spend time in all departments shopping for our customers and filling their online orders.

Order fillers and delivery associates also get to dispense orders to our customers and engage them in conversation throughout the dispensing process. The pace can be intense, especially in the evenings, on weekends, and during a holiday season. There are times when you have to juggle shopping for our online customers while stopping to help our in store customers. Duties and Responsibilities
  • Acknowledge and greet customers with a smile
  • Answer customer questions
  • Help customers find the products they are looking for
  • Assist fellow associates as needed throughout the store
  • Keep your area stocked, clean, and safe
* For a complete list of duties and responsibilities, please see the actual job description.

#storejobs

About Walmart

At Walmart, we help people save money so they can live better. This mission serves as the foundation for every decision we make, from responsible sourcing to sustainability—and everything in between. As a Walmart associate, you will play an integral role in shaping the future of retail, tech, merchandising, finance and hundreds of other industries—all while affecting the lives of millions of customers all over the world. Here, your work makes an impact every day. What are you waiting for?

Walmart, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer- By Choice. We believe we are best equipped to help our associates, customers, and the communities we serve live better when we really know them. That means understanding, respecting, and valuing diversity- unique styles, experiences, identities, abilities, ideas and opinions- while being inclusive of all people.

title: Manufacturing - Prod Machinist
description:
Job Description

Job Title: Prod Machinist

Location: Warsaw, IN, 46581

Duration: 6 Months

Shift: 3rd

Job Summary

This position is responsible for setting up machines, checking products, and keeping production items running through machining areas with quantity and quality acceptable to the Standard. May also perform additional responsibilities which include, but are not limited to, non-destructive testing, cell support, mass finishing, injection molding, and polishing.

Job Responsibilities
  • Setup machines, lathes, mills, or machining centers for the production of products.
  • Participate in ongoing process improvements.
  • Record production through DPI terminal and maintain count cards.
  • May perform additional cell responsibilities as necessary.
  • 100 Total Percent (not to exceed 100%) Individual percents should be greater than or equal to 5%.
This is not an exhaustive list of duties or functions and may not necessarily comprise all of the "essential functions" for purposes of the ADA.

Expected Areas of Competence (i.e. KSAs)
  • Must have a working knowledge of precision measuring equipment including mics, calipers, comparators, and indicators.
  • Must be able to lift in the 60-pound range repeatedly.
  • Must be able to work in a team/cellular environment.
  • Must demonstrate ability to perform setup on machines.
Education And Experience:
  • High School diploma plus two years machining experience on CNC lathes and/or mills or have four semesters or verified vocational or high school machine shop training with one year of CNC experience.
Travel Requirements: Up to 5%

title: Directeur adjoint Réception de nuit (H/F)
description:
Directeur adjoint de la réception de nuit (H/F)

Les collègues de la réception offrent un service agréable, sincère et personnalisé aux clients et leur permettent de vivre un séjour inoubliable dans les hôtels Fairmont. Doté d’excellentes compétences relationnelles, le directeur adjoint de la réception dirige, forme et récompense son équipe afin d’offrir un service exceptionnel aux clients!

Ce Que L'établissement Vous Offre
  • Travailler au Fairmont Le Château Frontenac vous permet, en tant que salarié régulier, d’avoir accès à une panoplie d’avantages tels qu’un régime d’assurances collectives, un régime de retraite avec participation employeur, un REER collectif, un service de cafétéria offert gratuitement sur place, l’entretien de vos uniformes de travail, un stationnement offert aux collègues à coût avantageux, plusieurs activités de reconnaissance, diverses activités offertes par notre Club Social, rabais corporatifs dans des centres sportifs, et encore plus!
  • Carte collaborateurs offrant des taux réduits chez Accor;
  • Plan de formations délivrées dans nos Académies;
  • L’opportunité de développer vos talents et de vous épanouir au sein de votre établissement et à travers le monde;
  • La capacité à faire la différence à travers nos activités Éthiques & Responsabilité Sociale des Entreprises, comme Planet 21.
Salaire: 32,41$/h

Heures de travail : 23h à 7h

Jours de congés : Vendredi et Samedi

Votre Rôle
  • Coordonner tous les aspects des aires de réception afin d’assurer un bon fonctionnement des opérations et d’atteindre le plus haut niveau de satisfaction de la clientèle
  • Assurer la maximisation du taux d'occupation et du tarif moyen par une participation dans le budget, les perspectives et la tarification en temps réel
  • Revoir les rapports des arrivées et des VIP pour s’assurer que les procédures sont suivies par tous les employés du département
  • Superviser les arrivées de groupe incluant une revue des réservations et des statuts des chambres, planifier leurs arrivées ainsi que les demandes spéciales
  • Aider à la planification de l’horaire du personnel selon des niveaux d'EFTE, en identifiant les périodes plus achalandées ainsi que le service à la clientèle
  • S’impliquer dans la gestion de la formation, du développement et de la performance de tous les employés de la réception
  • Assurer l’organisation et la communication de l’information à tous les employés de la réception ainsi qu’aux autres départements, afin de maintenir le plus haut niveau de satisfaction de la clientèle
  • Connaître les procédures d’urgence et les procédures de situations générales de crise afin de préserver la santé et la sécurité avant tout
  • Gérer les commentaires et les plaintes de clients, afin de s’assurer que les besoins de ceux-ci sont non seulement combler mais également que l’on a surpassé leurs attentes
  • Aider en fournissant les commentaires du client mystère aux employés afin de contrôler et d’améliorer la satisfaction de la clientèle
  • Participer au recrutement et à la formation des nouveaux employés de la réception
  • Participer et concevoir les réunions de communication à l’intérieur du département de la réception
  • Toutes autres tâches connexes
Votre Expérience Et Vos Compétences Incluent
  • Expérience antérieure dans la gestion des employés et/ou comme agent à la réception
  • Posséder de vastes connaissances sur les politiques et les procédures du département de la réception.
  • Détenir un diplôme de gestion hôtelière ou l’équivalent dans une institution reconnue est un atout
  • Avoir une vison élevée du service à la clientèle ainsi qu’une grande capacité à gérer des employés quotidiennement, afin d’atteindre des buts et de travailler dans un environnement participatif et agréable de travail en équipe.
  • Être extrêmement organisé et grandement flexible dans les heures de travail, les jours de congé ainsi que les tâches additionnelles
  • Doit être capable de travailler sous la pression, rapidement et dans un environnement constamment en changement.
  • Avoir une présentation remarquable
  • Posséder des connaissances au niveau opérationnel ainsi que savoir comment utiliser les logiciels informatiques tels que Opéra, Windows
  • Avoir une excellente communication orale et écrite et posséder des compétences en gestion et en relation interpersonnel.
  • Être bilingue (français, anglais et une troisième langue est un atout).
Votre Équipe Et Votre Environnement De Travail

Le Château Frontenac propose un savant mélange du riche charme historique de l'hôtel et d’une touche moderne, alliant parfaitement le passé à un futur des plus prometteurs. Élégantes et confortables, les chambres et suites du Château sont un endroit parfait pour profiter d’un séjour relaxant et inspirant. En choisissant l'une de nos 610 chambres et suites, nos clients bénéficient d'un service personnalisé qui font de leur séjour au Château une expérience mémorable.

Visa : Vous devez être légalement éligible à travailler au Canada.

Notre Engagement Diversité & Inclusion

Nous sommes une entreprise inclusive et notre ambition est d’attirer, de recruter, et de promouvoir la diversité des talents.

Pourquoi travailler chez Accor ?

Nous sommes bien plus qu’un leader mondial. Nous vous accueillons comme vous êtes et vous pouvez trouver le métier et la marque qui correspond à votre personnalité.

Nous vous accompagnons dans votre évolution et votre apprentissage au quotidien, nous nous assurons que votre travail apporte du sens à votre vie. Ainsi, durant votre expérience avec nous, vous pouvez explorer les possibilités illimitée du Groupe Accor.

En rejoignant Accor, vous écrivez chaque chapitre de votre histoire et ensemble nous pouvons imaginer l’Hôtellerie de demain. Découvrez la vie qui vous attend chez Accor, https://careers.accor.com/.

Faites ce que vous aimez, prenez soin du monde qui vous entoure, oser challenger le status quo ! #BELIMITLESS

title: 网络桌面运维
description:
职位来自于拉勾

岗位职责:
  • 负责全局网络、信息安全基础设施的规划以及机房建设项目管理;
  • 负责IDC机房配套设施的巡检、管理、维护、监控、排障、解决及总结等工作(如骨干网网络设备及LINUX服务器的软硬件等);
  • 配合研发人员进行安全分析和加强公司网络安全;
  • 对IT基础设施进行问题检测和排除处理;并及时进行技术分享，编写相关操作手册、故障处理流程，以及整理网络项目实施现场各阶段文档;
  • 负责IT HelpDesk桌面办公设备的日常维护及设备资产管理;
岗位要求:
  • 熟悉常用的路由交换协议：TCP/IP、STP、OSPF、BGP、VPC、MLAG、SSLVPN、DHCP、DNS等的协议原理，并能熟练操作华为、华三、锐捷等主流厂家设备;
  • 熟悉路由、交换，掌握网络设备配置与调试（防火墙、交换机、无线网络、上网行为、VPN及信息安全产品等）;
  • 熟悉综合布线及相关弱电机房的对接;
  • 具有云网络、IDC机房网络的规划、实施、管理、运维能力;
  • 熟悉网络分析工具，如Wirehark、tcpdump等或者具有独立分析和处理网络故障能力;
  • 熟悉虚拟化、docker等开源技术及相关的开源网络工具平台;
  • 拥有较强的学习能力，沟通组织能力、团队合作能力，良好的服务意识，责任心强，工作积极主动;
  • 具有华为、思科HCIE/HCIPCCIE/CCNP证书;

title: Philadelphia Technology Audit & Advisory Manager
description:
JOB REQUISITION

Philadelphia Technology Audit & Advisory Manager

LOCATION

PHILADELPHIA

ADDITIONAL LOCATION

Job Description

Are You Ready to Live Protiviti?

The Protiviti Career provides opportunity to learn, inspire, and advance within a collaborative and diverse culture.  We hire curious individuals for whom learning is a passion. Together, we focus on our mission of delivering confidence in a dynamic world – and the world has perhaps never been more dynamic.

At every level, we champion leaders who live our values of integrity, inclusion, innovation and commitment to success. Imagining our work as a journey, we believe integrity guides our way, inclusion moves us forward together, and innovation creates new destinations.

Living our values every day. That's Living Protiviti.

Are you inspired to make a difference?

You’ve come to the right place.

Where We Need You

The Philadelphia Office is seeking a Technology Audit & Advisory Manager to join our growing Internal Audit practice.

What You Can Expect

As a Manager, you’ll partner with our clients to solve complex business problems and provide best in class advice and solutions. You’ll develop lasting relationships with client personnel and seek to further these relationships through quality product delivery. You’ll also develop contacts within the business community and serve as an ambassador of Protiviti in the market.

Managers In Technology Audit & Advisory Work With Clients To Assess, Identify Risk, Advise, And Consult On a Wide Variety Of Technology Related Topics, Including
  • Major technology projects
  • Cybersecurity
  • Cloud
  • Data
  • Privacy
  • Enterprise Applications
  • Disaster Recovery
  • Analytics
  • Emerging Technologies
  • Control programs
At Protiviti, Technology Audit & Advisory Is About
  • Helping clients better understand and manage risks associate with their use (or lack of use) of technology, to protect and drive enterprise value
  • Innovation: new ways of thinking and new ways of doing
  • Technology enablement: analytics, automation, and other emerging tools and methods
  • Staying current: developing and maintaining skills in existing and emerging areas of technology
What Will Help You Be Successful
  • You enjoy discussing technical and industry trends and seek opportunities to demonstrate and teach seniors and staff on the job.
  • You effectively build and manage client relationships while delivering specific product solutions that add value.
  • You excel at identifying opportunities to integrate product solutions and resources to optimize client service capabilities.
  • You are driven to learn and interested in all things related to data & technology, including the latest trends and developments.
  • You enjoy assisting in the preparation and execution of strategy to win new business.
  • You seek opportunities to interact with and mentor junior team members, including participating in the creation and rollout of training and developing skill sets.
  • You make conscious use of real-time supervision during all phases of an engagement to develop our people.
  • You have an inherent interest in project management and team leadership. You seek new ways to create extraordinary development opportunities and ways for your team to make an impact on our clients and communities.
Do Your Talents Include the Following?
  • Advanced verbal and written communication skills, including documentation of findings and recommendations.
  • Leading teams in executing audit methodologies and developing key internal audit deliverables focusing on technology topics, including process flows, work programs, audit reports, and control summaries.
  • Establishing and cultivating critical business relationships / networking with senior executives.
  • An in-depth understanding of IT audit methodologies, concepts, tools and objectives.
  • Knowledge and interest in all things related to data & technology, including the latest trends and developments with a specific focus on areas of technology included: cybersecurity, cloud, data governance, privacy, analytics, enterprise applications (e.g., SAP, Oracle, Workday, Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics etc.), disaster recovery, systems development methodologies etc.
  • Understanding of commonly used internal control frameworks, including COBIT, ISO 27001, NIST CSF, CIS, ITIL, etc.
  • An interest and/or experience in areas including analytics and emerging technologies (automation, AI/ML etc.).
  • Knowledge of Sarbanes-Oxley Act provisions and methodologies for achieving compliance, in particular the technology implications and requirements.
  • Ability to translate technology topics and audit issues into “business speak” to be understood by executives.
  • Superior supervisory experience of teams including performance appraisal, mentoring / coaching, oversight and review of work, coordination across teams, and understanding how to motivate.
Your Educational And Professional Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s degree, preferably in relevant discipline (e.g. Accounting, Finance, Information Technology, Cybersecurity, or Business Related Field).
  • 5+ years working in internal audit, consulting, assurance services, risk & control programs, or related field, either in professional services or industry.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite applications with specific emphasis on Word, Excel and PowerPoint. Secondary emphasis on Visio and Access.
  • Experience working with financial services organizations or banking institutions preferred (but not required).
  • Proficiency in PowerBI, Tableau, Alteryx, SQL, Python, RPA Solutions preferred (but not required).
  • Professional Certification such as CIA, CRMA, CISA, CISM, CISSP, or similar strongly preferred.
Do You Love Exploring New Places?

We travel throughout the month frequently based upon client requests/commitments. Travel may include suburban, regional, or out of state locations.

Protiviti is not registered to hire or employ personnel in the following states – Montana, West Virginia, Alaska.

Protiviti is not licensed or registered as a public accounting firm and does not issue opinions on financial statements or offer attestation services.

Protiviti is an Equal Opportunity Employer. M/F/Disability/Veteran

As part of Protiviti’s employment process, any offer of employment is contingent upon successful completion of a background check.

Protiviti is committed to being an equal employment employer offering opportunities to all job seekers, including individuals with disabilities. If you believe you need a reasonable accommodation in order to search for a job opening or to apply for a position, please contact us by sending an email to HRSolutions@roberthalf.com or call 1.855.744.6947 for assistance.

In Your Email Please Include The Following
  • The specific accommodation requested to complete the employment application.
  • The location(s) (city, state) to which you would like to apply.
For positions located in San Francisco, CA: Protiviti will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.

For positions located in Los Angeles, CA: Protiviti will consider for employment qualified Applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring.

title: Sales Development Representatives (SDRs)
description:
Overview

We welcome you to become a part of the rapidly growing Legal Technology sector. Join PracticeLeague, one of India's leading LegalTech companies which is trusted by over 10,000 users from 15+ countries and is the only Indian LegalTech company to be recognized by Gartner in their industry market guides and reports.


We are a strong team of 65 and expected to reach 100 before the end of this year and you can be part of our success story. Become a part of this incredible journey and no, you don’t have to be a legal professional or a technology expert to become a part of our team.


Role

Sales Development Representative (SDR)


Job Description

We are looking for smart and motivated individuals who don't mind sharing their opinions and can work on their own without any micro-management.


  • In this role, you will be the face of the company and the first step in the prospecting process
  • The sales teams will rely on your persuasive abilities and creative methods to find potential customers
  • Research market to identify and mine data of potential clients and reach out to them
  • Use phone, emails, and social media to connect with the prospects
  • Qualify the need and interests of the prospect before the sales meeting
  • Maintain minutes of the meetings and update systems as necessary


Job Requirements

  • 4+ years of sales development and lead generation experience
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Should be open to working from the office (Baner Road, Pune)

title: Orthopedic Spine Surgeon
description:
OrthoMichigan, one of the Midwest�s premier independent orthopedic groups, is seeking to add a fellowship trained orthopedic spine surgeon.

OrthoMichigan is located in Mid-Michigan and provides orthopedic service to three health care systems and area surgery centers. With over 30 years of experience, the group provides advanced bone and joint care with sub-specialties in hand/upper extremity, foot/ankle, joint replacement, sports medicine, and spine.�

The group is solely responsible for training 15 orthopedic residents, which includes surgical rotation and orthopedic call at two area hospitals.

Competitive salary with a two year track to partnership.

Shift

Day (United States of America)

Description

Discover Where Amazing Works

Bilingual Spanish Social Work Clinician Adult Intensive Outpatient Program NYP Psychiatry Columbia

At NewYork-Presbyterian, we have a long-standing commitment to understanding the healthcare needs of the communities we serve and adapting our programs to meet those needs. Our ultimate goal is to reduce and ultimately erase, health disparities by linking our neighbors with the world’s best healthcare services.

We leverage hospital and community resources to reduce health disparities through innovative population health initiatives, care provider training, scholarship, and research. These initiatives are collaboratively developed, implemented, evaluated, and sustained. By combining our skills and resources with the energy, immense talents, and resources of our community partners, we achieve these goals.

The IOP Bilingual Spanish Social Worker provides clinical experience to the triage, assessment, crisis management, and intensive individual, family and group interventions in Spanish. The Social worker will collaborate with all members of the interdisciplinary clinical team, to provide the full spectrum of outpatient psychiatric services.

This is a Monday-Friday day shift position

Mainly onsite with some hybrid work opportunities

This is an 1199 position.

  • Spanish language proficiency
  • Experience in psychiatric setting work
  • 3 years psychotherapy with individuals
  • LCSW

  • If a new graduate Social Worker, Limited Permit (must supply exam date prior to start of employment)
  • If a new graduate Social Worker, must have Licensed Masters Social Worker (LMSW) by the State of New York within 1 year of hire
